attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: A blend of iconic 1980s Grand Prix nostalgia and the very latest in technology. The XSR900 GP embodies the spirit of Yamaha's racing past and embraces modern day performance to become the ultimate Sport Heritage model.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Designed to evoke memories of the golden era, the XSR900 GP is the ultimate blend of heritage racing style combined with the latest in cutting-edge technology to offer a thrilling ride to stimulate the senses in a way like no other.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value:
With a look reminiscent of the YZR500 ridden to victory by iconic Yamaha racers in the '80s and '90s, the XSR900 GP is a celebration of Yamaha's racing pedigree like never seen before.
The YZR Grand Prix racer inspired front fairing and seat hump evoke memories of the Golden Era of Grand Prix racing – a true tribute to some of the most iconic race bikes of Yamaha's past.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value:
Don't be fooled by the heritage style – underneath the bodywork lies the latest in cutting-edge, Yamaha technology resulting in a truly capable machine that thrills with each twist of the throttle. 
The latest in braking and suspension components enhance the ride, while integrated riding modes and an extensive electronics package raise the bar even further.

attributes.name: productShortStoryHeader
attributes.value: The embodiment of Yamaha Racing history

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Designed to evoke memories of the golden era, the XSR900 GP is the ultimate blend of heritage racing style combined with the latest in cutting-edge technology to offer a thrilling ride to stimulate the senses in a way like no other. With styling reminiscent of the 1980s Grand Prix bikes, the XSR900 GP is the true embodiment of Yamaha's illustrious racing past.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value:
The Sport Heritage range exists to pay tribute to some of the most iconic motorcycles from our history, by blending this nostalgic design with the very latest in high performance engine and chassis technology. 
And when it comes to racing, no machine is more iconic than the YZR500s taken to multiple Grand Prix victories by many iconic racers in the 1980s and 1990s.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The XSR900 GP's iconic looks are paired with some of the most advanced technology available in the class, with the grin-inducing torque of the 890cc engine paired with a lightweight and agile chassis, plus premium suspension, to offer a riding experience that gets the pulse racing.

attributes.name: productOverviewHeader
attributes.value: Legendary YZ past. Wide open future.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: In 1973 Yamaha launched the YZ line – and in the same year the company won its first ever World Motocross Championship. To celebrate 50 years of YZ production the YZ450F 50th Anniversary Edition has been created – an exclusive model that combines proven MXGP winning technology with 1990’s inspired colours and graphics that honour the company’s historical racing DNA.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Yamaha launched the YZ-line 50 years ago and won its first World Motocross Championship back in 1973. To celebrate this half-century of continuous YZ production the exclusive YZ450F 50th Anniversary Edition has been created. Equipped with the same class-leading engine and chassis technology that has powered our factory riders to numerous MXGP and SX race wins, this limited edition pays tribute to this special moment in the history of Yamaha.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: It’s the lightest, slimmest, sharpest and fastest 450cc motocross bike ever built by Yamaha – and its high-tech design is the result of 50 years of racing and winning at the very highest level. The reverse-head engine ensures super-efficient combustion for increased performance, and the latest Power Tuner App makes is easy to select the best engine mapping.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The mass centralized design enables the lightweight chassis to deliver ultimate agility – while the best-in-class KYB suspension ensures that you can lay down the power efficiently and effectively. And with its 1990’s inspired Anniversary White bodywork with purple/pink graphics, a purple seat and black wheels, you can feel the pure racing DNA every time you ride!

attributes.name: productShortStoryHeader
attributes.value: Legendary YZ past. Wide open future.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha has been producing the legendary YZ line-up since 1973. During this time the company has won almost every major motocross championship. This race-winning DNA is what gives today’s YZ450F 50th Anniversary Edition the edge – while the 1990’s inspired colours and graphics pay tribute to Yamaha’s distinguished half-century of racing history.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: With its unique front facing air intake, the YZ450F 50th Anniversary Edition’s reverse-head high-torque engine gives you holeshot winning acceleration and race winning performance – and the latest generation Power Tuner App enables you to select the engine mapping to suit best the different circuits and riding conditions.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: With its highly centralized mass, the lightweight aluminium chassis delivers outstanding cornering agility together with planted straight-line performance – and the compact Anniversary White bodywork and flat purple seat give you the seamless mobility you need to shift your bodyweight quickly for total chassis controllability.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: This is the most advanced production motorcycle ever created by Yamaha. Built specifically for supreme performance on the racetrack, the Yamaha R1M is equipped with revolutionary electronic control technology that enables you to push even harder and discover your true potential.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The R1M is the most advanced production motorcycle ever created by Yamaha. Built specifically for supreme performance on the racetrack, it is equipped with revolutionary electronic control technology that enables you to push even harder and discover your true potential.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Yamaha has created the race-focused R1M using some of the most sophisticated technology developed from the race-winning M1 MotoGP bike. Its state-of-the-art Öhlins Electronic Racing Suspension (ERS) with NPX anti-cavitation gas front forks bring out your best performance at every circuit – and the low frontal area carbon bodywork helps to shave your lap times.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: But what really makes the R1M such a game-changer are the high-tech rider aids including Brake Control, Engine Brake Management and Launch Control – as well as a Communication Control Unit for datalogging and wireless engine tuning. Available in the renewed carbon-and-black Icon Performance colour featuring blue accents and blue wheels, the R1M is the ultimate R-Series delivering the most complete racetrack package.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha first entered World Grand Prix racing 60 years ago, and during this period the factory’s race bikes have won over 500 GP races. The latest R1M been constructed using all of the experience gained in MotoGP and WorldSBK, making this the most sophisticated production Yamaha motorcycle ever built.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Just like the M1 race bike, the R1M’s hugely powerful 998cc crossplane engine features an uneven firing sequence that delivers strong and linear torque for exhilarating acceleration. And its advanced electronic control technology gives you the highest level of engine and chassis control, that allows you to push harder on every part of the circuit.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Absolutely no compromises have been made in the development of this outstanding track bike, and its specification includes the most advanced Öhlins Electronic Racing Suspension (ERS) and NPX anti-cavitation gas front forks – as well as powerful brakes and a lightweight carbon bodywork in renewed carbon and black Icon Performance colour. Yamaha R1M: because racing is life, and life is racing.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The ultimate Heritage Roadster is here for those who want to have the choice to either Rev or Relax. With its timeless design inspired by Yamaha’s legendary racing bikes combined with the sheer muscle power from the high-tech CP3 EU5 engine, the XSR900 has it all.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The XSR900 holds its own on all routes, whether it is on those daydreaming twisty roads or the open straight, it feels at home doing both. Equipped with the most modern electronics package that gives every rider the highest level of controllability in any type of situation. And with its sporty Quick Shifter as well as a relaxed Cruise Control, you can go as you please with this 3-cylinder muscle machine.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Don’t be fooled by the timeless good looks of the XSR900, because underneath that 80s sport bike look there’s some serious high-performance technology. Not only does it come with the smooth EU5 890cc CP3 engine with a ton of torque, but it’s also fitted with a lightweight Deltabox-style chassis with Brembo radial master cylinder, lightweight Spinforged wheels and fully adjustable suspension.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: As the emperor of the Sport Heritage range, the XSR900 is the ultimate proof of the Faster Sons philosophy in action. Taking its design inspiration from some of Yamaha’s legendary historic machinery, this high-performance motorcycle is the living proof of decades of intensive research and development.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: This is the kind of motorcycle that you can enjoy in almost any kind of situation. It’s easy ergonomics are specially designed to give you an open and adaptable riding position that makes every ride more enjoyable. From narrow twisty backroads through to fast open corners or relaxed cruising through town, the XSR900 is ready for anything.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The ultimate Sport Heritage bike has been built to arouse your senses, so that every time you go for a ride you can expect something very special. The timelessly styled bodywork and premium finish give you a genuine feel good factor. The powerful intake roar and symphonic exhaust sounds from the high-torque 890cc CP3 engine are sure to get the adrenaline flowing and your heart beating faster.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The XSR900 is equipped with the most advanced rider control technology in the class, and data from the sophisticated 6-axis Inertial Measurement Unit controls traction, slides, wheelies and braking to put you in total control. This allows you to pack more emotion, excitement and enjoyment into every kilometre.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Fast, light and compact, the latest YZ450F is a motocross bike that has been developed to consistently bring out your best performance out on the track. Its linear power delivery and compact bodywork give you ultimate control – and the “Quick Setting”, Power Tuner app is the smartest way to achieve quicker lap times!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: This is the lightest, slimmest, sharpest and fastest 450cc motocross bike ever built by Yamaha. Its winning potential in MXGP and SX show just how good this bike is. And whatever level you race, the YZ450F has the engine, chassis and electronics that are ready to bring out your best performance.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The unique reverse-head engine is a perfect example of how Yamaha technology can make you a better rider. Its strong and linear power gives you the absolute control required to achieve faster lap times. And the easy-to-use Power Tuner app enables you make quick trackside adjustments to the engine character and traction control settings to match the conditions.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Its lightweight aluminium frame and best-in-class KYB suspension systems deliver the cornering precision and straight-line stability you need stay ahead – and the compact seamless bodywork combined with idealized ergonomics give you ultimate rider mobility on the YZ450F, for maximum control when accelerating, braking and cornering.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Every rider is different. When Yamaha built the latest generation YZ450F it was designed with you, the rider, as the main focus - and to be powerful, light and slim, while offering strong stability and agility. The linear power delivery and compact bodywork is giving you ultimate control, as the YZ450F has been designed to bring out your best performance onto the track.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The Power Tuner app enables you to make quick trackside adjustments to your bike’s performance without you even opening your toolbox. The ‘Simple Tuning’ function makes it easy to adjust the engine and chassis performance – and a lap timer function means that you can see which settings achieve the best results. You can also adjust the behaviour of the traction control and launch control systems to match the different riding conditions.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The best-in-class KYB forks feature a hand adjustable compression damping adjuster – and with its super-compact seamless bodywork, flat seat and factory-developed ergonomics, you have the ultimate rider mobility for maximum control when accelerating, braking and cornering. Yamaha YZ450F: Tune in to victory.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: In 1983 Yamaha’s first ever Ténéré model changed everything. With its big tank and rugged go-anywhere versatility, this best-selling motorcycle opened up an exciting new age of Adventure riding. 40 years later the exclusive long-distance Ténéré 700 World Rally pays tribute to Yamaha’s winning Dakar bikes – and gives you the freedom to go wherever you want to go.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: In 1983 Yamaha’s first ever Ténéré model changed everything. With its big tank and rugged go-anywhere versatility, this best-selling motorcycle opened up an exciting new age of Adventure riding. 40 years later the exclusive long-distance Ténéré 700 World Rally pays tribute to Yamaha’s winning Dakar bikes – and gives you the freedom to go wherever you want to go.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Inspired by the machines that took six Dakar victories in the hands of legendary French rider Stéphane Peterhansel, the Ténéré 700 World Rally features exclusive factory racing colours – and its high specification includes a lightweight Akrapovič slip-on muffler, as well as special long-travel forks, wheels and flat rally seat finished in black.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: This premium adventure bike is the most sophisticated model in the Yamaha Adventure range. With its 23-litre dual fuel tanks and its famous big-torque 690cc CP2 engine, as well as best-in-class KYB suspension and connected TFT meter, the Ténéré 700 World Rally is ready for any adventure.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: It all started in 1979 when Yamaha won the first ever Dakar Rally. This famous victory inspired Yamaha to create the original Ténéré for riders who wanted a bike that could take them anywhere. Now the Ténéré Spirit is as strong as ever with the new Ténéré 700 World Rally – the most exclusive adventure bike ever made by Yamaha.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Like every Ténéré, the World Rally can trace its roots directly back to Yamaha’s winning race bikes. Its dynamic colour scheme is inspired by the factory race machines that powered Stéphane Peterhansel to six Dakar victories – and these same heritage colours are featured on the Ténéré desert racers of Pol Tarrès and Alessandro Botturi.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Equipped with premium components including an Akrapovič slip-on muffler, this high specification machine gives you more than ever before. Its 690cc CP2 engine is the most versatile in the class – while the long travel front and rear KYB suspension systems, Öhlins steering damper and switchable 3-mode ABS ensure full control on the road and dirt.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The next evolution MT-10 SP is ready to introduce you to the ultimate riding experience. It’s updated CP4 EU5 engine is the most powerful in the Hyper Naked line-up. And the radical semi-active electronic suspension and high-tech rider aids represent the dawn of a thrilling new era in total ride-by-wire controllability.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The next evolution MT-10 SP is ready to introduce you to the ultimate riding experience. It’s updated CP4 EU5 engine is the most powerful in the Hyper Naked line-up. And the radical semi-active electronic suspension and high-tech rider aids represent the dawn of a thrilling new era in total ride-by-wire controllability.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: This brutal and iconic naked sport bike is the first motorcycle in the world to be fitted with Öhlins’ a 6-mode electronically controlled spool valve suspension. In semi-active mode the damping force is automatically adjusted to suit riding conditions, giving the highest degree of chassis precision when braking, accelerating and cornering.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: To enable you to fully exploit the 998cc engine’s increased power and torque there’s a 6-axis Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) that controls traction, slides, wheelies, engine braking and brake power. Exclusive MT-10 SP equipment includes a 3-piece lower cowl and braided brake hoses – and with its dynamic race-inspired Icon Performance colour and premium finish, the MT-10 SP has it all.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: When the first crossplane MT was launched nearly a decade ago it brought a whole new riding emotion to the street. Because every MT’s clear focus is on torque, agility and feel. With its raw and uncompromising style, premium finish and the most incredible technology, the next evolution MT-10 SP takes the Hyper Naked riding experience to a completely new level.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Right now the Hyper Naked category is where the some of the most radical designs and the most extreme technologies are emerging. With its compact headlight assembly and redesigned body, the MT-10 SP projects a brutal and aggressive look that highlights its mechanical strength and functionality. And its specially tuned intake and exhaust broadcast a sensational soundtrack.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: No other naked sport can match its stunning specification. Equipped with a total package of electronic rider control technology, the R1-derived 998cc crossplane engine delivers absolutely incredible performance that a wide range of adjustability that allows you to make this bike your own. And the Öhlins semi-active electronic suspension is a total game changer. Are you ready for the Hyper Naked future?

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The YZ line was born in 1973. And in the same year Yamaha won its first Motocross World Championship. Featuring 1990’s inspired white bodywork with purple/pink graphics, a purple seat and black wheels, the YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition celebrates the half century of YZ production.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The special YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition celebrates the half century of YZ production that began in 1973 – the same year that Yamaha won its first ever World Motocross Championship. Featuring 1990’s inspired racing colours with white bodywork, purple/pink graphics, a purple seat and black wheels, this exclusive edition pays tribute to the past while looking to the future.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: With a totally new lightweight aluminium chassis, ultra-compact white bodywork and an uprated engine with more top-end power, the new generation YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition comes with pure Yamaha Racing DNA running through it. It may feature retro racing colours, but everything about this high-tech motocross machine breathes advanced technology and winning performance that has made Yamaha one of today’s most successful names.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The best-in-class KYB suspension comes with revised settings for even better traction and bump absorption. A new flatter seat and narrow shrouds enhance the ergonomics to give greater controllability – and with its uprated Power Tuner App the YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition is simpler to set up for strong performance at different tracks.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: When Yamaha rider Hakan Andersson won the company’s first Motocross World Championship on his YZ250 he showed that the brand was a serious contender. And 50 years later the company is more committed than ever to producing innovative YZ models that give every rider the chance to discover their real potential.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Its 1990’s inspired colour scheme and graphics celebrate the past, but the YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition is equipped with the very latest technology including an all-new lightweight bilateral aluminium frame. Its lower centre of gravity ensures faster and more agile cornering – and the revised suspension settings together with improved rear brake feel and revised ergonomics give you a higher level of controllability.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Significant changes to the Motocross Grand Prix winning engine include a new ECU and YZ450F-style rear duct air intake that deliver stronger top-end power – and the uprated Power Tuner App’s ‘Quick Tuning’ function is simple to use. Celebrate half a century of the YZ line with the new YZ250F 50th Anniversary Edition!

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Created using cutting-edge technology from Yamaha’s race-winning M1 MotoGP® machine, the R1 is the ultimate race-bred supersport. And to commemorate 60 years of Grand Prix racing, Yamaha has created the outstanding R1 World GP 60th Anniversary. Finished in historic white-and-red racing colours, this is the ultimate tribute to some of the racing world’s most iconic bikes.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Featuring cutting-edge technology from Yamaha’s race-winning M1 MotoGP® machine, the R1 is the ultimate race-bred supersport. And to commemorate 60 years of Grand Prix racing, the outstanding R1 World GP 60th Anniversary has been created. Finished in historic racing colours, it’s the ultimate tribute to some of Yamaha’s most iconic racing bikes – and is sure to become a collector’s machine with riders who appreciate this special heritage.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Yamaha’s first international road race was at the French GP back in May 1961. The first race win came in 1963. And by 1964 Yamaha had claimed its first World Championship. Since then, the factory’s race bikes have powered to more than 500 Grand Prix wins. The special World GP 60th Anniversary livery is marking 60 years of Yamaha competing at the highest level of motorcycle racing.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The R1 World GP 60th Anniversary features iconic red "speed block" graphics and a white fairing – combined with a 60th anniversary emblem, yellow front plate and golden wheels – that are inspired by Yamaha’s original factory race bikes that were taken to victory by legendary riders including Read, Saarinen, Agostini and Roberts. They’re an integral part of Yamaha’s history. And by riding the R1 World GP 60th Anniversary you can be a part of this very special celebration.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: To mark the 60th anniversary of the company’s first Grand Prix race, Yamaha has designed a special look for the R-Series line. Finished in one of the most famous and best-loved historic racing colour schemes, the R1 World GP 60th Anniversary is the ultimate tribute to Yamaha’s historic race bikes.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Back in May 1961 a group of Yamaha engineers and riders travelled from Japan to Europe with the 250cc RD48 to take part in their very first international road race at the French GP. Looking back, it was probably one of the most significant events in the company’s history. Only three years later, Yamaha won its first World Championship and is now one of the most successful names in World Grand Prix.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The R1 World GP 60th Anniversary’s iconic red "speed block" graphics on the pure-white fairing look as good today as they did all those years ago. A red front fender and thick red stripe along the top of the tank and tail replicate the historic design used on the early GP bikes – and gold-coloured wheels together with a yellow front number plate and gold tuning fork tank logo capture the spirit of another era. R1 World GP 60th Anniversary: A fitting tribute to Yamaha’s illustrious racing history.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its timeless scrambler styling the XSR700 Legacy makes you feel special every time you ride. Inspired by Yamaha’s iconic models from the past, this characterful Sport Heritage motorcycle blends classic looks with the very latest engine and chassis technology to bring you the ultimate Faster Sons experience.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Featuring timeless scrambler looks inspired by some of Yamaha’s most iconic machines from another era, the XSR700 Legacy is the kind of motorcycle that makes you feel very special on every ride. And behind its classic persona you’ll discover the very latest engine and chassis technology that’s ready to deliver truly thrilling performance.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: By creating an alternative style of bike that blends retro style with modern technology, Yamaha XSR models give you the opportunity to ride your own way. With its wide braced handlebars and round lights – as well as unique colours and block pattern tyres, this compact Sport Heritage bike will be the centre of attention.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: XSR700 Legacy is great to look at – and even better to ride! The beating heart of this charismatic modern retro is Yamaha’s iconic 690cc CP2 engine that punches well above its weight to give amazing acceleration. And the combination of a compact tubular chassis with plush suspension and block pattern tyres gives outstanding agility and roadholding on the street and gravel.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Since 1955 Yamaha has been building some of the world’s most iconic motorcycles. And the Sport Heritage line has been developed for riders like you who love the timeless looks of classic Yamahas – but you also want up to the minute performance and technology. Which is why you need to take a look at what the XSR700 Legacy can offer.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The bottom line is that this great looking motorcycle is all about pure, honest fun. And everything you see on this modern retro is designed to make you feel good wherever you go. The authentic character of the XSR700 Legacy is enhanced by the blend of Speedblock and brushed aluminium, black fork gaiters, circular LED lights, scrambler style handlebars and a flat dual seat.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Open the throttle and feel the remarkable acceleration and instant throttle response. See how the agile chassis goes exactly where you want to go. And don’t be surprised to find yourself smiling a lot inside your helmet. Because this is how a motorcycle should be.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Right from the very start the R1 was developed without compromise, and this pure and focused design philosophy is what makes this high-tech race-bred Yamaha the most exciting supersport bike of our time.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Right from the very start the R1 was developed without compromise, and this pure and focused design philosophy is what makes this high-tech race-bred Yamaha the most exciting supersport bike of our time.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Every piece of advanced technology on the R1 has been developed using the knowledge gained from Yamaha’s involvement in racing at the highest level. The remarkable 998cc 4-cylinder EU5 crossplane engine is a direct descendant of the M1 unit – while the aerodynamic bodywork comes straight from racetrack development.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: But above all, it’s the R1’s incredible array of smart electronics that make this bike so very special. Equipped with everything from a ride-by-wire throttle through to a Launch Control System (LCS), Engine Brake Management (EBM) as well as Brake Control (BC) and much more, this is the ultimate Yamaha supersport that is built to lead the way on the road and track. And it comes in a sporty new duo-tone Icon Blue with matte blue colour scheme, as well as the dynamic Yamaha Black option.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Just about everything on the latest R1 can directly trace its origins back to the racetrack, where Yamaha’s race winning MotoGP® and WorldSBK bikes have been developing and testing the advanced technology that you can now see and experience on your R1.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Yamaha Motor Company famously won its first ever race just 10 days after the company was founded. That fact probably tells you all you need to know about Yamaha’s competitive mindset. And this total commitment to racing is what enables the world’s most innovative motorcycle manufacturer to create a machine like the R1.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The aggressive fairing with its central air intake is the most obvious connection with the M1 race bike – while the race-bred intelligent technology used in the seven electronic rider controls connects you and your R1 and ensures the highest degree of controllability. And with its sophisticated suspension, highly refined EU5 engine, premium RS11 tyres and dynamic new duo-tone Icon Blue colouring, the R1 is ready to give you the ultimate supersport experience.

attributes.name: productOverviewHeader
attributes.value: The lighter, sharper and more advanced new YZ250F.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The Yamaha YZ250F has been a consistent race winner in Motocross Grand Prix and Supercross – making it a favourite with many riders looking for proven performance. Yamaha’s designers have been working hard to find areas where any improvement could be made. Featuring a new chassis, ultra-compact bodywork and increased power, the next generation YZ250F is now lighter, sharper and more advanced.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The YZ250F is a favourite choice for riders who want the ultimate combination of controllable power, agile handling and Yamaha durability. As soon as you ride the new generation YZ250F you’ll feel the difference immediately. With a totally new chassis, ultra-compact bodywork and an uprated engine, the new YZ250F is like the bike you already love. Only lighter, sharper and more advanced!

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The all-new chassis comes straight from the outstanding YZ450F that won numerous MXGP and Supercross races in its first season. Featuring revised geometry and a repositioned head pipe, the bilateral aluminium frame’s lower centre of gravity and improved rigidity balance enables more agile cornering and rapid directional changes.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Another major change on the 2024 YZ250F is the totally new compact bodywork featuring ultra-slim shrouds as well as a much flatter seat profile for rapid weight shifting. There’s also a new high-efficiency air-management system and revised ECU that boost top end performance on the responsive 250cc 4-stroke engine – while the new version of the Power Tuner App features an intuitive ‘Quick Tuning’ function.

attributes.name: productShortStoryHeader
attributes.value: The lighter, sharper and more advanced new YZ250F.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: As soon as you ride the new generation YZ250F you’ll feel the difference immediately. Featuring a lower centre of gravity, the new lightweight bilateral aluminium frame gives you increased levels of agility for faster cornering and rapid directional changes. And with a much flatter seat and narrower radiator shrouds the enhanced ergonomics provide increased controllability.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The reverse head engine is already a proven Motocross Grand Prix winner, and the new model gets a significant top-end power boost thanks to a new rear duct air intake and revised ECU. The best-in-class KYB suspension runs with different settings for improved bump absorption – and the rear brake feel is adjusted for more accurate control.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Yamaha pioneered wireless engine tuning, and the latest YZ250F is equipped with an uprated Power Tuner system with a ‘Quick Tuning’ function that makes it easier to choose the best mapping and maximize your performance at different tracks. And with the Power Tuner App’s lap timer you can see which settings are reducing your lap times.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Tuned to produce an even more sensational feeling of torque for the most thrilling experience, the new MT-10 is the most advanced Hyper Naked ever built by Yamaha. Manufactured using cutting-edge engine and chassis technology from the R1, the latest MT-10 gives you more power, more agility and more feel.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Tuned to produce an even more sensational feeling of torque for the most thrilling experience, the MT-10 is the most advanced Hyper Naked ever built by Yamaha. Manufactured using cutting-edge engine and chassis technology from the R1, the latest MT-10 gives you more power, more agility and more feel.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The King of the MT lineup demands total respect, and the first thing that’s going to grab your attention is the compact headlight assembly and restyled tank that highlight the MT-10’s outstanding mechanical beauty. And the moment you hear the 998cc CP4 engine’s deep intake roar coming out of the air intakes, you’ll know that this bike is the one for you.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Hidden deep in the lightweight Deltabox chassis is the most sophisticated package of electronic rider aids, designed to give you the highest degree of controllability. With adjustable high-tech systems that control traction, slides, wheelies, engine braking and braking, you can make your MT-10 behave exactly the way you desire.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: When Yamaha launched the first MT Hyper Naked a decade ago the motorcycle world changed forever. With a clear focus on torque, agility and feel, the MT range has given riders the chance to experience the raw emotion and on-demand excitement that makes every Hyper Naked special.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: With its more powerful engine, restyled body and proven chassis, the next evolution of the MT-10 is the ultimate Yamaha Hyper Naked that has been built for every rider who wants to own, ride and appreciate one of today’s most outstanding motorcycles.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Everything about this King of the MT lineup is special – from the tuned intake roar and howl of the titanium exhaust, through to the R1-derived Deltabox chassis and the thrilling scream created by the 998cc CP4 engine’s uneven firing sequence. When you understand what this bike is about, you’ll know you’ve got to have it.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: This is Yamaha's ultimate long distance adventure motorcycle that has the power to change the way you explore our planet. Equipped with high capacity dual fuel tanks and long travel suspension that can take you further than ever, the Ténéré 700 World Raid gives you the chance to discover what’s beyond the Next Horizon.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: This is Yamaha's ultimate long distance adventure motorcycle that has the power to change the way you explore our planet. Equipped with high capacity dual fuel tanks and long travel suspension that can take you further than ever, the Ténéré 700 World Raid gives you the chance to discover what’s beyond the Next Horizon.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Its large capacity 23-litre dual fuel tanks give a range of up to 500 kilometres – making it possible to cross huge areas of wilderness without worrying about running dry. To stay informed and in touch wherever you go, the 5” TFT colour display with smartphone connectivity shows incoming text and call notifications on screen.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Exclusive features include an Öhlins steering damper as well as fully adjustable long-travel front and rear suspension that’s designed to handle tough off-road terrain – and the 3-mode ABS gives confidence in all conditions. All this bike is missing is a rider like you who has the courage to break out of your comfort zone and go beyond the next horizon.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Back in the early 1980s Yamaha launched a bike that was to start a whole new movement in motorcycling. With its big tank, rugged engine and versatile chassis, the original XT600 Ténéré made long distance adventures a reality for anyone with the desire to discover new landscapes and different ways of life.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Today the need to discover true freedom is greater than ever. And the Ténéré 700 World Raid has everything you need to take a break from the rat race and see for yourself what is waiting for you beyond the next horizon. Just fill up the dual tanks and you can reach distant destinations without even stopping for fuel.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Long travel suspension and easy ergonomics with a flat seat/tank area make long distances more comfortable – and when the highway ends this bike’s confident off-road handling and high-torque CP2 engine are designed to get you to the most remote locations. The world is waiting for you. So get on your Ténéré 700 World Raid and discover what you’re missing.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Back in the early 1980s Yamaha launched a bike that was to start a whole new movement in motorcycling. With its big tank, rugged engine and versatile chassis, the original XT600 Ténéré made long distance adventures a reality for anyone with the desire to discover new landscapes and different ways of life.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Today the need to discover true freedom is greater than ever. And the Ténéré 700 World Raid has everything you need to take a break from the rat race and see for yourself what is waiting for you beyond the next horizon. Just fill up the dual tanks and you can reach distant destinations without even stopping for fuel.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Long travel suspension and easy ergonomics with a flat seat/tank area make long distances more comfortable – and when the highway ends this bike’s confident off-road handling and high-torque CP2 engine are designed to get you to the most remote locations. The world is waiting for you. So get on your Ténéré 700 World Raid and discover what you’re missing.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The new R1 GYTR is a track-ready Supersport bike that gives you the chance to fulfil your true race aspirations, and is exclusively available through the GYTR PRO SHOPS. Developed by Yamaha’s team of dedicated racing engineers, this superbike was efficiently built to give you what you need to go on track, with the necessary parts and carefully selected GYTR® components.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The Yamaha R1 is a main contender in superbike racing. Its winning performances in WorldSBK®, British Superbike and many other national championships all over the world tell you all you need to know. Now you can get your hands on the R1 GYTR specifically built to create your own racing bike right of the box or by customising it with the wide range of optional GYTR® parts and the support of the racing experts.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The R1 GYTR features the remarkable 998cc 4-cylinder CP4 crossplane engine which is a direct descendant of the MotoGP winning M1 race bike, and is available exclusively through the GYTR PRO SHOPS. Its uneven firing sequence delivers linear torque for outstanding performance and high levels of rear wheel traction – combined with its sophisticated GYTR programmable ECU – enables you to push even harder to the chequered flag.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Developed by Yamaha’s team of professional race technicians, the new R1 GYTR is a fully prepared track-only superbike that is supplied to you in a race-ready specification, through the GYTR PRO SHOPS. Equipped with a smart package of necessary track parts and performance enhancing racing components, this track machine is ready to take you to the next level.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Fully equipped with a comprehensive range of engine, chassis and electronic technology, the new R1 GYTR gives to every track day riders and racers the ultimate canvas to create their own dream race machine and is available through the GYTR PRO SHOPS. Featuring the race-ready specification that has been tested and developed on Yamaha’s WorldSBK® winning race bikes, this machine is a real game changer.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The R1 GYTR features the remarkable 998cc 4-cylinder CP4 crossplane engine which is a direct descendant of the MotoGP winning M1 race bike. Its uneven firing sequence delivers linear torque for outstanding performance and high levels of rear wheel traction – combined with its sophisticated GYTR programmable ECU – enables you to push even harder to the chequered flag.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Developed by Yamaha’s team of professional race technicians, the new R1 GYTR is a track-only superbike that is supplied to you in a race-ready specification, including advanced GYTR programmable ECU and a lightweight wiring harness, lightweight glass fiber carbon reinforced race cowling, race handle bar, race rear sets and much more. This smart package of necessary track parts and performance enhancing racing components offers you a track machine ready to take you to the next level.

attributes.name: productDisclaimer

The R1 GYTR will be available exclusively through GYTR PRO SHOPS, Yamaha’s specialist dealer shops. Always wear a helmet, eye protection and protective clothing. attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Created using the same pure race-bred DNA that comes with every Yamaha Supersport bike, the R7’s compact dimensions and high-torque engine are guaranteed to put a smile on your face with every ride. And to celebrate 60 years of Grand Prix racing, Yamaha has created the exclusive R7 World GP 60th Anniversary with the iconic "speed block" colour scheme.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Created using the same pure race-bred DNA that comes with every Yamaha Supersport bike, the R7’s compact dimensions and high-torque engine are guaranteed to put a smile on your face with every ride. And to celebrate 60 years of Grand Prix racing, Yamaha has created the exclusive R7 World GP 60th Anniversary with the iconic white and red "speed block" colour scheme.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Yamaha’s involvement in Grand Prix racing started way back in 1961 when the company entered the French GP to compete at the highest level. The team’s first victory came soon after, and Yamaha won the first of many World Championships in 1964. The race wins continue, with over 500 victories recorded to date – and many more to come.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Every R-Series supersport owes its existence to Yamaha’s race bikes. The R7 World GP 60th Anniversary’s iconic white body colour with red "speed block" graphics and special 60th anniversary emblem – combined with a red front fender, yellow front plate and gold-coloured wheels – embodies 60 years of GP racing and celebrates the famous race bikes and riders that have helped to make Yamaha what it is today.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The R7 World GP 60th Anniversary is a perfect example of Yamaha’s mission to create high quality motorcycles that inspire, thrill and excite. Fast, light and agile – and finished in Yamaha’s most famous historic white and red racing colours – this is the ultimate accessible Supersport.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: More than any other manufacturer, Yamaha’s foundations are built on racing. Just days after the company was founded it entered and won its very first race at Mount Fuji. Yamaha’s decision to go Grand Prix racing in 1961 took the brand into the big time. The winning has continued ever since. And racing remains at the heart and soul of Yamaha.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Take a look at the R7 World GP 60th Anniversary and everything you see on this agile supersport has been influenced by Yamaha’s racing DNA. From the shape of the central air intake to the construction of the lightweight wheels and design of the radial braking system, this bike is truly race-bred in every sense. And with its special white body colour with red "speed block" graphics and 60th anniversary emblem – combined with a red front fender, yellow front plate and gold-coloured wheels – the R7 World GP 60th Anniversary embodies and celebrates 60 years of GP racing.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: 50 years ago the original YZ250 won Yamaha’s first ever World Motocross Championship and the new YZ line was born. It was the beginning of an incredible journey that has seen Yamaha claim just about every title worth winning. The YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition gives you the opportunity to own an exclusive 2-stroke that pays tribute to the riders and bikes that made us who we are.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The YZ250 2-stroke has earned the right to be described as a legend. The original model won Yamaha’s very first World Motocross Championship way back in 1973 – and the new YZ line was born. Already for 50 years the YZ250 has been at the heart of motocross. And to celebrate this half a century of YZ production, Yamaha has created the exclusive new YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring 1990’s inspired white bodywork with purple/pink graphics – as well as a purple seat and black wheels – the exclusive YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition pays tribute to 50 years of the YZ line-up. And every time you go racing you feel the pure racing DNA that has made this one of the most celebrated models in the history of motocross.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Powered by Yamaha’s outstanding 250cc 2-stroke YPVS engine that’s mounted in the company’s proven aluminium chassis, the YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition provides the hard-charging acceleration and lightweight agility that gives you the potential to beat any other machine on the day. Its best-in-class KYB suspension is ready for any terrain, and the iconic Anniversary White body colours and graphics make this special edition a very desirable race bike.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: As soon as you drop the clutch and power out of the gate, you’ll know exactly why the YZ250 is Yamaha’s most celebrated 2-stroke. Nothing can match the pure excitement of this winning lightweight racer that has been in continuous production for 50 years. With its exclusive 1990’s inspired Anniversary White body colours and purple/pink graphics, the new YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition pays tribute to the legendary YZ line.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: This iconic 2-stroke is one of the most competitive models out there thanks to its aluminium chassis, easy agility and explosive engine performance. With its high efficiency air intake system and torque-boosting YPVS, the compact 250cc 2-stroke engine provides instantaneous throttle response and awesome acceleration, making this one of the most exciting dirt bikes you’ll ever ride.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The lightweight chassis and premium KYB suspension give you super-light handling for faster cornering – and the latest generation bodywork with narrow shrouds and flat seat looks great and makes for effortless front/rear weight shifting. And with its exclusive white bodywork, purple/pink graphics, purple seat and black rims, the YZ250 50th Anniversary Edition takes this legendary 2-stroke to another level.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Inspired by the legendary riders and iconic Yamaha machines that made Dakar the greatest race in the world, the Ténéré 700 Rally Edition pays tribute to those heroes that tamed the desert. Finished in a heritage white and red colour scheme, this high specification adventure bike can change your life.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: When the first Dakar Rally took place back in 1979 it gave the Yamaha XT a chance to prove itself in the world’s toughest race. XT riders won this legendary event in ’79 and ’80, and inspired the development of the original Ténéré in 1983 – Yamaha’s iconic adventure bike that changed the world of motorcycling.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: 40 years on, the Yamaha Ténéré 700 is capturing the imagination of a new generation of riders who want to discover what’s over the next horizon. For 2023 the exclusive Yamaha Ténéré 700 Rally Edition comes with heritage rally colours, 3-mode switchable ABS and a refreshed TFT meter with smartphone connectivity.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Featuring white and red racing livery, speedblock graphics and gold rims, the Ténéré 700 Rally Edition pays tribute to the factory bikes raced in Dakar. With its premium components and pure Ténéré DNA, this is Yamaha’s ultimate heritage adventure bike.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The original Ténéré helped to make Yamaha the most successful brand in the Dakar, with XT models taking 18 podiums in the first 6 editions of the world’s toughest race. The pure race-bred DNA that conquered the desert has been passed through the generations to the new Yamaha Ténéré 700 Rally Edition. And it shows.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: A specially-developed one-piece rally seat gives you a higher and more upright riding position that makes it easier to shift your body weight and stand up on the pegs in the dirt – and the Akrapovič muffler delivers a rich and throaty growl that amplifies the CP2 engine’s addictive big-torque feeling.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Other premium components include a heavy duty 4 mm thick skid plate that gives extra frame and engine protection in tough terrain, as well as a radiator protector and laser cut chain guard – while LED flashers, knee grip pads and off road handlebar grips complete the Rally Edition’s high specification.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The XSR700 is one of the favourite motorcycles for those riders who seek a rebellious fun machine with a seriously fashionable edge. Great looks inspired by Yamaha’s heritage models combined with the torque rich CP2 engine guarantees an unforgettable ride. Not to mention the hard-to-remove grin on the riders face.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The XSR700 is a true legacy machine, earning it’s stripes on the road. The beating heart of the machine is the versatile character. The XSR700 is a bike to be ridden, anyway you like.  From casual cruising to hitting the twisties, the bike can do it all.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: An accessible motorcycle that is enjoyable for both new and experienced riders. The 2-part frame, tank construction and seat design are still a key factor in the XSR700, safeguarding the easy-to-customise feature the bike is renowned for.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The character of the XSR700 is defined by the sublime combination of a light and agile frame and the torque-rich, playful CP2 engine. The super nimble bike is easy to steer in any setting, from curves and twisty roads to busy city traffic, you’ll have a blast either way.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The XSR700 features its timeless design aspects like retro-influenced bodywork, a stepped seat and a classically styled head-and-tail light. Respecting the bikes of the past, whilst embracing the contemporary by making use of all the modern technology likes ABS, LED lights, the most efficient CP2 engine to date and a modern inverted LCD meter.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: As with its CP2-brothers the XSR700 is fitted with the EU5 compliant characterful 690cc engine. Refining the rideability of the XSR700 even more – but keeping every bit of fun with the multi-talented engine performance.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The livery of the XSR700 pays tribute to the past, the colour schemes were influenced from iconic motorcycles of Yamaha’s rich history. The famous 2-stroke RD350LC from the early eighties provides the inspiration for the modern interpretation of the colour schemes, resulting in the a crisp Historic White and a more elegant Historic Black combination.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Push the limits with the Ténéré 700 Extreme, the tough new member of the Adventure range. Its long-travel fully adjustable KYB suspension takes you to another level of pure off-road performance. Equipped with titanium footrests, a high enduro front fender and ergonomic rally seat, this high specification 690cc 2-cylinder machine is built for any challenge.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The Ténéré has rocked the Adventure world like no other bike. Its special combination of a go-anywhere lightweight chassis with a high torque CP2 engine makes it a truly remarkable and versatile machine. Now there’s a tough new member joining this legendary family – and it’s built for the relentless adrenaline seekers.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Inspired by Yamaha’s winning rally-raid bikes, the Ténéré 700 Extreme is built to take you even deeper into rough terrain. With its high specification KYB suspension and increased ground clearance, as well as a range of off-road oriented components and 3-theme connected TFT meter, this hardcore 690cc go-getter is ready for just about anything.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Whether you’re an experienced adventure rider or you’re new to this exciting world of discovery, the new Ténéré 700 Extreme is the kind of machine that demands your attention. Seek it out now and find your own kind of extreme.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Ténéré 700 riders already know that this is a truly remarkable and exciting bike. It’s the number one machine in its class because it gives everyone the ability to get out there and explore. And with its long-travel fully adjustable suspension and factory-fitted special equipment, this Ténéré 700 takes you closer to the Extreme.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The bike’s key technology includes high specification Kashima coated KYB front forks that give 230 mm of super-smooth travel to help tame the most severe terrain. Together with its more progressive KYB rear suspension system with 220 mm travel and higher ground clearance, the Ténéré 700 Extreme is Yamaha’s ultimate off-road Adventure lightweight.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The flatter rally-style seat and lightweight titanium footrests give improved ergonomics and controllability – and the high level enduro front fender, chain guide and aluminium radiator protector underline the bike’s serious off-road capabilities, while its connected 3-theme 5-inch TFT meter keeps you informed and in touch.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The YZ250 is a true legend in every sense of the word. Ever since it won Yamaha’s first ever World Motocross Championship in the 1970s the YZ250 has been challenging for the podium in motocross, supercross and freestyle MX. It’s Yamaha’s ultimate 2-stroke. And it’s always ready to win.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The legendary YZ250 2-stroke is the kind of motocross bike that makes you want to just keep on riding. Whether you’re racing, freeriding or just playing in the dirt, the YZ250’s thrilling acceleration and super-agile handling make this one of the most exciting and enjoyable bikes you’ll ever experience.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: With pure race DNA flowing through it, the YZ250 is like nothing else. At some time in your race career you really need to see what this bike can do for you. You’ll never forget the first time you ride a YZ250 2-stroke. Whether it’s the stunning acceleration, outstanding agility or its adrenaline-inducing performance you’ll understand why it’s built up such a massive following all over the world.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The exhilarating 250cc liquid-cooled engine gives you an instant hit of power for holeshot-winning acceleration – and the YPVS (Yamaha Power Valve System) gives you plenty of torque at low to mid rpm. It’s industry-leading KYB front forks and rear shock give outstanding traction with plenty of surface feedback – and the slimline bodywork and flat seat enable rapid weight shifting when braking, accelerating and cornering. Featuring classy duo-tone colours and new graphics, the YZ250 is ready to win.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: You’ll never forget the first time you ride a YZ250 2-stroke. With its stunning acceleration, outstanding agility and adrenaline-inducing performance, this dirt bike likes to play hard! On the motocross track this bike fears nothing and no-one. And when you’re fun riding or practicing with your buddies, the YZ250 can do just about whatever you ask of it!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: This bike has earned a worldwide reputation as one of the most competitive motocross bikes out there thanks to its lightweight handling, easy agility and explosive engine performance. The industry-leading KYB suspension features idealized low speed damping settings for a high level of traction and accurate feedback – and the 270mm front disc and high-specification front caliper give you outstanding control.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: With its high efficiency air intake system and torque-boosting YPVS, the compact 250cc 2-stroke engine provides instantaneous throttle response and awesome acceleration, making this one of the most exciting dirt bikes you’ll ever ride. And with its duo-tone colours and new graphics the YZ250 looks as good as it goes.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The Dark Side of Japan never sleeps. It’s the inspiration behind every Yamaha MT and the exclusive MT-09 SP is the latest CP3 masterpiece to emerge from the Darkness. Featuring exclusive R1M-inspired colours, as well as premium suspension and enhanced rider aids, the ultimate 3-cylinder Hyper Naked is ready to inspire and excite.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The Dark Side of Japan never sleeps. It’s the inspiration behind every Yamaha MT and the exclusive MT-09 SP is the latest CP3 masterpiece to emerge from the Darkness. Featuring exclusive R1M-inspired colours, as well as premium suspension and enhanced rider aids, the ultimate 3-cylinder Hyper Naked is ready to inspire and excite.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Its 890cc EU5 CP3 engine produces even more linear torque at lower rpm for awesome acceleration – while its R1-type 6-axis IMU and lean-sensitive electronic rider aids give you precision control in the wet and dry. And with fully adjustable 41mm front forks and a high specification Öhlins rear shock, the chassis of the MT-09 SP is sharper than ever.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: As well as the exclusive Icon Performance colours, the MT-09 SP comes equipped with a special double stitched seat for the ultimate fit – and the brushed anodized swingarm, anodized black handlebars and levers and clear-smoked brake reservoirs add to the model’s premium looks and feel.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Back in 2013, Yamaha changed the landscape of the motorcycle world with the introduction of the original MT-09. With its sharp focus on linear torque, lightweight agility and fierce, naked looks, the bike was an instant success. Over the next decade, the MT Hyper Naked range grew rapidly – and to complete the line-up, the exclusive SP model was created.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: With its iconic CP3 engine, chassis and bodywork – and the best-in-class electronic rider aids – the MT-09 represents a giant leap forward for the Hyper Naked rider. Never before has any manufacturer been able to offer such a sophisticated package at such a competitive price.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Recognising that some riders are looking for the ultimate specification, Yamaha has developed the exclusive MT-09 SP. Its Icon Performance colour scheme bears witness to the R1 derived technology such as the 6-axis IMU – and its premium front and rear suspension systems as well as the special double-stitched seat and high quality components exude quality.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Yamaha R-Series models have been thrilling thousands of riders for over 20 years. Now there’s a sharp-looking addition to the range that’s ready to welcome a new generation of riders into R/World. Fast, agile and handsome, the R7 offers sports performance with everyday fun.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Yamaha R-Series models have been thrilling thousands of riders for over 20 years. Now there’s a sharp-looking addition to the range that’s ready to welcome a new generation of riders into R/World. Fast, agile and handsome, the R7 offers sports performance with everyday fun.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The lively 689cc CP2 engine with A&S clutch provides torque-rich acceleration for a truly exciting riding experience on the track and road. The super narrow and aerodynamic bodywork features an aggressive twin-eye face with a powerful central LED headlight – and the sharp tail and deeply sculpted tank are shaped by pure R-Series DNA. The R7’s high specification brakes and suspension give optimum controllability when cornering and braking.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The frontal area of the R7 is the smallest of the R-Series models, and ensures the highest levels of aerodynamic efficiency – while clip-on handlebars, rear sets and a bump-stop seat give you an adaptable and sporty riding position. This outstanding next generation Supersport makes R/World a reality for thrill-seeking riders like you – whether you’re riding on the track or out on the road.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: R-Series from Yamaha is evolving. While the flagships R1M, R1 and World Supersport Championship winning R6 RACE continue to dominate the top end of the category, the new R7 is specifically aimed at riders who want pure Supersport design with exciting real-world performance at an accessible price.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The torque-rich 689cc CP2 engine instantly delivers punchy and controllable power at the twist of your wrist. With its agile handling chassis that’s equipped with inverted front forks, high-spec brakes and radial-mount front calipers, the R7 offers you a premium specification – whether you’re riding on the track or out on road.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Its athletic twin-eye bodywork has the slimmest frontal area of any other R-Series models, ensuring the highest levels of aerodynamic efficiency – and clip-on handlebars, rearsets and a bump-stop seat give you an adaptable and sporty riding position. This outstanding next generation Supersport makes R/World a reality for thrill-seeking riders like you – and you’ll find that the R7’s torque-rich performance, aggressive R-Family design and super-agile handling put it in a class of its own.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Imagine a world where you could really have fun on the journey into work – and get there in less time than on a crowded bus or train. If leaving home later, getting home sooner and reducing travel costs sounds good, the fashionable and affordable new XSR125 could be the bike you’ve been waiting for.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The fashionable new XSR125 has got what it takes to get you there in less time. Its timeless looks and eye-catching colours stand out wherever you go, and the full-power 125cc 11kW engine and agile handling make every trip into work or college a whole lot more fun than going by crowded public transport.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: It’s the newest bike in Yamaha’s Sport Heritage line up, and comes with a premium specification that includes LED lights and full LCD instruments just like the larger capacity XSR700 and XSR900 – as well as a lightweight Deltabox frame and USD front forks that give a confident and comfortable ride.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value:
More than anything, the new XSR125 is all about becoming part of Yamaha’s stylish and unique Faster Sons movement that includes a whole package of clothing and accessories that match your attitude. It’s the sure way to having more fun and freedom, and is ready to make things happen for you.
* Limitations and restrictions may apply per country under applicable local laws

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: You don’t have to be a motorcyclist to ride the XSR125. Because this new lightweight has been specifically developed for anyone who may be reconsidering the way they live their life. And if – like many people – you’re looking at alternative ways to get around, this new Yamaha has everything to offer.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: With its comfortable riding position, smooth suspension and agile handling, the XSR125 is a joy to ride. Its full-power 11kW 125cc engine is fully EU5 compliant for use in many restricted city centres*, and features Yamaha’s advanced VVA technology for reduced emissions and increased economy. And its pure neo-retro design gives a timeless look and understated appeal.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value:
Like every Yamaha, the XSR125 features a premium specification for a first class riding experience – and reliability and build quality are second to none. So if you’re a car driver with a B-licence* – or a rider with an A-licence – it’s time to join the Faster Sons family and discover a new sense of freedom with the fashionable, affordable and fun new XSR125.
* Limitations and restrictions may apply per country under applicable local laws

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition is a very special bike. It’s the latest evolution of one of the most famous motocross bikes ever produced. Featuring 1990’s inspired colours and graphics as well as a purple seat and black wheels, this exclusive high-tech lightweight 2-stroke pays tribute to 50 years of Yamaha YZ production.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Featuring 1990’s-styled white body colour and graphics, the YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition pays tribute to 50 years of continuous Yamaha YZ production. Chosen by many thousands of riders as their first full sized race machine, the YZ125 is one of the most iconic motocross bikes ever produced.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Powered by the latest generation 125cc engine that produces instantaneous power thanks to its Keihin Powerjet carburettor and lightweight internals, the YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition is a special version of Yamaha’s celebrated 2-stroke motocross bike. Its close ratio 6-speed transmission enables seamless performance at all speeds – and the Yamaha Power Valve System (YPVS) ensures a wide spread of torque.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The winning combination of a lightweight chassis with ultra-slim ergonomic bodywork and the best-in-class KYB suspension work together to create one of the most agile motocross bikes you’ll ever experience. And with its Anniversary white colour, purple/pink graphics, purple seat and black wheels, the YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition gives you total exclusivity with winning performance.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: During its half-century long history, the legendary YZ125 has become a favourite with thousands of aspiring riders who are aiming high. It has been winning races all over the world and at every level since Yamaha started producing the YZ line 50 years ago. The YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition is specially designed for young motocross racers just like you who have got what it takes to make it big.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: As you’d expect from a motorcycle that’s been continuously developed for longer than any other bike in its class, the YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition is a totally sorted machine that is ready to win. Its hard charging, compact 125cc 2-stroke engine benefits from a torque-boosting YPVS for increased performance over a wide rev range – and the lightweight aluminium chassis, high-spec KYB suspension and compact bodywork make this one of the sharpest weapons on the track!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: If you’re really serious about making it to the top, Yamaha’s highly successful YZ bLU cRU FIM Europe Cup program is the way to go. It’s where tomorrow’s stars get a chance to qualify for the bLU cRU Europe Cup SuperFinale, and it’s the place where aspiring riders can take their first steps towards a professional career. With its retro white racing colours, purple/pink graphics, purple seat and black wheels, the YZ125 50th Anniversary Edition gives you total exclusivity with winning performance.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: This is the ultimate 600cc Supersport bike that has been dominating WorldSSP racing for years. Like every R-Series it has been developed without compromise in order to achieve the highest levels of performance. And to make it even easier for you and your team to prepare for the racing season, the track-only R6 RACE is now supplied in race ready trim.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: This is the ultimate 600cc Supersport bike that has been dominating WorldSSP racing for years. Like every R-Series it has been developed without compromise in order to achieve the highest levels of performance. And to make it even easier for you and your team to prepare for the racing season, the track-only R6 RACE is now supplied in race ready trim.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The R6 RACE is equipped with an aggressively styled body featuring the iconic M-shaped front air intake. Inspired by the factory’s M1 MotoGP® bike, this bodywork gives you maximum aerodynamic efficiency for reduced lap times – while the compact Deltabox chassis, sculpted aluminium fuel tank and slim magnesium subframe enable you to tuck in close to the bike on the straight.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Available in Tech Black, the stripped down R6 RACE is the perfect bike for everyone from track day riders through to hungry racers who want to make their name with their first major victory. With so many WorldSSP titles to its credit, the lightweight 599cc inline four-cylinder engine has proved that it’s the fastest in the business – and with its Yamaha Chip Controlled Intake (YCC-I) and Yamaha Chip Controlled Throttle (YCC-T) – as well as a slipper clutch, close ratio 6-speed transmission and Quick Shift System (QSS) – the track-ready R6 RACE gives you the highest level of controllability on every circuit.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: You only need to look at this 600 Supersport’s outstanding track record in WorldSSP and many other race series all over the world, to see that it’s the fastest way to get on the podium. And to make it even easier for you and your team to prepare for the racing season, the R6 RACE is now supplied in race ready trim.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Non-essential road components such as headlight, position lights, mirrors and passenger seat have been removed so that you can get straight to work on creating your ultimate competition machine. Available in Tech Black, the stripped-down R6 RACE is the perfect bike for everyone from track day riders through to hungry racers who want to make their name with their first major victory.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Whether you’re looking for a class-leading Supersport for circuit riding or you are preparing to compete at national or international level, the R6 RACE has shown beyond doubt that it’s the most competitive bike in its class. The lightweight 599cc inline four-cylinder engine has proved that it’s the fastest in the business – and with its compact Deltabox chassis and slim magnesium subframe – as well as a slipper clutch and Quick Shift System (QSS) – the track-ready R6 RACE gives you the highest level of controllability on every circuit.

attributes.name: productDisclaimer
attributes.value: The R6 RACE can only be used on closed circuits, private areas and specific events where participation with non-registered vehicles is allowed. Always wear a helmet, eye protection and protective clothing. Yamaha encourages you to ride safely and respect fellow riders, local laws and the environment. Images displayed may depict a professional rider performing under controlled conditions or on a closed circuit. The unit displayed in the images may be equipped with genuine Yamaha accessories and/or non-Yamaha branded accessories which may be for closed-circuit use only. All information is given for general guidance and is not binding for Yamaha. Specifications and appearance of Yamaha products, Yamaha accessories and non-Yamaha branded accessories are subject to change without prior notice. Non-Yamaha branded accessories are fully developed and produced by respected third parties. Yamaha does not guarantee the availability of the displayed products and accessories in local markets. The product and accessories range may be limited in some countries. Yamaha has the right to discontinue products and accessories without prior notice. Where applicable, Yamaha products and accessories availability, specifications and prices may vary according to local laws, requirements and conditions. No rights can be obtained from this information. All product and technical data are provided on an 'as is' basis without any express or implied warranties. For further details and availability, please contact your local Yamaha dealer.
