attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The iconic YZ125 is one of the world’s most famous race bikes. It has been in continuous production and winning races for longer than any other motocross machine. And with its super-light handling, razor-sharp power delivery and best-in-class suspension, the latest generation YZ125 is the ultimate generation of the Yamaha 2-stroke.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Yamaha has been building 2-stroke motocross bikes for the past 50 years – and has been an equally long history in racing. It is this unrivalled experience that has enabled the company to develop the latest YZ125 – a bike that is built to take you into the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring lightweight race-bred engine internals and benefitting from Yamaha’s famous torque-boosting YPVS (Yamaha Power Valve System), the YZ125 develops hard-hitting power that keeps you way out front. The high-efficiency air intake ensures optimum performance and instant throttle response – and the slick shifting close-ratio 6-speed transmission helps you to shave precious seconds off your lap times.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Its sharp looking ultra slim bodywork gives you a high degree of controllability on the ground and in the air – and the flat seat and race-developed ergonomics allow you to move easily around the bike when braking and accelerating hard. The YZ125 is in it to win it – now just add your ability and prepare to enter the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Right now the YZ125 is the bike of choice for future champions. The YZ125’s super slim bodywork, agile high specification chassis and flat seat allow you to shift weight quickly for total control – and with Yamaha’s most powerful 125cc production engine, high efficiency braking system and state-of-the-art suspension, this bike is destined for the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: When you’re aiming for the top you need the right bike that can deliver the performance you need to show you’re a winner. The YZ125’s engine features a YPVS for increased useability over a wider rpm range ¬– and with its Keihin powerjet carburettor and slick shifting 6-speed transmission, the best-ever YZ125 gives tomorrow’s professional riders the winning performance they need to make their name.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: And if you’re really serious about making it to the top, Yamaha’s highly successful YZ bLU cRU FIM Europe Cup program is the way to go. It’s where tomorrow’s stars get a chance to qualify for the bLU cRU Europe Cup SuperFinale, and it’s the place where winning riders can take their first steps towards a professional career.

attributes.value: Yamaha has been a leading contender in the 125cc 2-stroke class from the very beginning. And the YZ125 is a clear statement that Yamaha is in it to win it! Powered by the company’s fastest ever 125cc 2-stroke motocross engine and featuring a high-tech chassis with best-in-class suspension and slimline ergonomic bodywork, this bike is built to take you into the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The YZ125 was developed with a clear mission: to give young motocross riders a machine that can win at every level. Which is why we’ve developed our fastest ever Yamaha 125cc 2-stroke engine as well as the lightest handling high-tech chassis with industry-leading suspension and radical slimline bodywork.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring lightweight race-bred engine internals and benefitting from Yamaha’s famous torque-boosting YPVS (Yamaha Power Valve System), the YZ125 develops hard-hitting power that keeps you way out front. The high-efficiency air intake ensures optimum performance and instant throttle response – and the slick shifting close-ratio 6-speed transmission helps you to shave precious seconds off your lap times.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: This iconic Hyper Naked is a true power. Its large-capacity 890cc high-torque engine and lightweight aluminium chassis give a thrilling performance and razor sharp handling, while the best-in-class electronic rider aids give you total control. And the radical next-generation design and premium finish say it all.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The original MT-09 was a totally new kind of Japanese machine that brought real excitement and pure emotion back to the motorcycle world. It inspired over 50,000 European riders to be a part of the growing Hyper Naked movement. Give in to the power of the MT-09 and join the Dark Side of the Japan.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Its large-capacity 890cc EU5-compliant CP3 engine pushes out high levels of torque at low rpm, giving you an explosive acceleration and stronger road-focused performance. A high-tech 6-axis IMU governs the best-in-class electronic rider aids, to give you ultimate control. Moreover, the QSS enables you to change gear very quickly, while making downshifts more stable.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: For razor sharp handling, the MT-09 features a compact aluminium chassis along with adjustable suspension and super light wheels. Dual 298mm front brakes with a radial master cylinder ensure fingertip control. And the radical next generation styling and pure coverless chassis design confirm the MT-09 as a ruthless Hyper Naked.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The modern MT story began almost a decade ago, when Yamaha’s top designers set out to create one of the most significant new models in the history of the Yamaha Motor Co., Ltd. This was to be no ordinary motorcycle. The brief was to build a radical new machine, with a big-torque engine and a highly agile chassis. A machine that would be like no other. And the rest is history.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: By defying convention and taking inspiration from Japan’s unique biking subculture, Yamaha succeeded in making a new kind of motorcycle. Inspired by the Dark Side of Japan, the first MT-09 that was so different that it didn’t fit into any existing category. So, the company created a new Hyper Naked class, which has already won the hearts of over 250,000 riders throughout Europe.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: With a focus on fun, excitement and emotion – combined with a commitment to giving the rider the best engine and chassis package as well as the most dynamic styling and class-leading rider aids – all of this at a competitive price – the premium specification MT-09 takes the Hyper Naked concept to a whole new level.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Yamaha R6 has been dominating WorldSSP racing for years. The new R6 GYTR is about to make it even harder for the opposition. Equipped with special racing components from GYTR® – Yamaha’s in-house tuning specialists – the R6 GYTR is designed to hit the track.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The Yamaha R6 has been dominating WorldSSP racing for years. The new R6 GYTR is about to make it even harder for the opposition. Equipped with a selection of special racing components from GYTR® – Yamaha’s in-house tuning specialists – the R6 GYTR is created to hit the track.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring a wide range of GYTR racing parts, the R6 GYTR is designed for the racetrack and is built to take your supersport racing performance to the next level. These special racing parts including a race specification ECU, wire harness and AIS plug set that optimise the engine output – and the titanium Akrapovič pipe reduces weight and sharpens up the 599cc engine’s high rpm performance.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Further race equipment includes racing sprockets, adjustable racing rear set with reverse shifting kit and stainless steel brake line set. Available exclusively from Yamaha GYTR PRO SHOP dealers, the R6 GYTR is fitted with a white primer fairing and can be customised by your dealer in your personal racing livery and tuned (at an additional cost).

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: No other 600cc Supersport can match the Yamaha R6 on the racetrack. It has been the most successful bike in just about every international and national Supersport race series. With several WorldSSP Championship wins in recent years, the R6 has achieved legendary status. And now the R6 GYTR is just about to make winning a little bit easier.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Designed and built purely for the racetrack, the R6 GYTR is supplied to you in racing specification. Special racing parts include a programmable ECU, lightweight wire harness and AIS plug set that optimise the engine power – and the titanium Akrapovič pipe reduces weight and sharpens up the 599cc engine’s high rpm performance. Further GYTR® parts mounted at the Yamaha GYTR PRO SHOP include a racing rear set with reverse shifting kit and stainless steel brake line set that complete the overall race specification.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The R6 GYTR’s lightweight glass fibre carbon reinforced cowling comes in white primer, enabling you and your team to instantly apply your race colours and sponsor logos (at an additional cost). Start talking to your Yamaha GYTR PRO SHOP now and make next season your best ever!

attributes.name: productPhotoDisclaimer
attributes.value: The unit depicted in these images is equipped with optional Yamaha Genuine Accessories.

attributes.name: productDisclaimer
attributes.value: The R6 GYTR can only be used on closed circuits, private areas and specific events where participation with non-registered vehicles is allowed. The R6 GYTR will be available exclusively through YAMAHA PRO SHOPS, Yamaha’s specialist GYTR dealer shops. Always wear a helmet, eye protection and protective clothing. Yamaha encourages you to ride safely and respect fellow riders, local laws and the environment. Images displayed may depict a professional rider performing under controlled conditions or on a closed circuit. The unit displayed in the images may be equipped with genuine Yamaha accessories and/or non-Yamaha branded accessories which may be for closed-circuit use only. All information is given for general guidance and is not binding for Yamaha. Specifications and appearance of Yamaha products, Yamaha accessories and non-Yamaha branded accessories are subject to change without prior notice. Non-Yamaha branded accessories are fully developed and produced by respected third parties. Yamaha does not guarantee the availability of the displayed products and accessories in local markets. The product and accessories range may be limited in some countries. Yamaha has the right to discontinue products and accessories without prior notice. Where applicable, Yamaha products and accessories availability, specifications and prices may vary according to local laws, requirements and conditions. No rights can be obtained from this information. All product and technical data are provided on an 'as is' basis without any express or implied warranties. For further details and availability, please contact your local Yamaha dealer.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: If you’re as serious about winning as we are at Yamaha, then you need to make sure that your next bike is the Yamaha YZ85. Featuring a powerful 2-stroke engine, lightweight chassis and premium suspension, this youth motocross bike has everything you need to make it to the top of the podium.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Yamaha has been building championship winning 2-stroke motocross bikes for 50 years. Along the way we’ve won just about every title worth winning. The latest YZ85 comes with the same advanced race-bred technology that goes into the company’s adult motocross machines, and is ready to power you into the victorYZone.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Many of today’s pro riders started their careers on the YZ85. And when you take a look at what this bike has to offer you can see why. Its high performance 85cc liquid-cooled 2-stroke engine is equipped with Yamaha’s race-bred YPVS that gives you holeshot-winning acceleration. And its adjustable suspension systems are built to master the toughest tracks.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The YZ85 also comes with a lightweight aluminium rear frame and aluminium swingarm, large diameter disc brakes and a high-efficiency air intake – just like the bigger YZ125. For maximum rider control there’s a flat seat, slim body, and an ergonomic fuel tank. And with a duo-tone Icon Blue color scheme and new graphics completing the looks, the YZ85 is ready to power you to the next level.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: You’ve developed your skills and refined your style on smaller bikes – and now you’re moving on to the next stage. Choosing the right motocross bike is an important decision. And when you see what the YZ85 has to offer, it’s clear that this is the only way to go.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Yamaha has been building winning 2-strokes for 50 years – and the YZ85 has been built using all of the knowledge gained over many years racing at Grand Prix level. Equipped with fully adjustable KYB suspension, large diameter disc brakes and lightweight wheels, this bike has got what it takes to win.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: For a wide spread of power the punchy and reliable 85cc 2-stroke engine is equipped with the Yamaha Power Valve System – and a high-capacity radiator and durable 6-speed transmission are built to handle the toughest races. And with its dynamic slimline bodywork and race-developed ergonomics, the YZ85 is the bike that can turn your dreams into reality – and show the world you’re truly serious about winning.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its high-torque engine, slim chassis and tough rally-bred design, this rugged motorcycle will unleash your spirit of adventure. The Ténéré 700 changes everything. The Next Horizon is Yours.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: When you're riding the Ténéré 700, your future can be whatever you want it to be. Because this is a go-anywhere motorcycle than enables you to live life without limits, and experience a new feeling of total freedom.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Driven by a high-torque 690cc 2-cylinder EU5-compliant engine equipped with a special optimised transmission that gives you the ideal balance of power and control, this rally-bred long distance adventure bike is built to master a wide range of riding conditions on the dirt or asphalt.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The compact tubular chassis and slim bodywork offer maximum agility during stand up or sit down riding – and long travel suspension and spoked wheels give you the ability to get to anywhere you want. Just fill up and go! The Next Horizon is Yours.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha's original XT models made world travel a reality for every rider. Now, the legend continues. With the Ténéré 700 you can discover real adventure and change your life forever.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Featuring rugged rally-bred technology including upside down forks, lightweight spoked wheels and 3-mode switchable ABS, this Dakar-inspired motorcycle makes world travel a reality. Its 16-liter fuel tank gives 350km+ range between refills – and the ergonomic riding position and rally screen enable you to cover huge distances in comfort.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Riding on asphalt or powering across the most remote plains, the Ténéré 700's agile handling and linear torque give you full control. And wherever you want to ride, this bike is designed to get you there.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Featuring a distinctive next generation body with a signature Y-shape LED face and new dual-theme 5-inch TFT instruments with smartphone connectivity, the best-selling MT-07 is the ultimate Hyper Naked middleweight. Offering an unbeatable package with the best balance of torque-rich performance and brutal naked style, this is a bike that works well for everyone!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With over 160.000 units sold, the MT-07 has held the number 1 position in its class since it was launched. With its torque-rich 690cc CP2 engine, compact and agile chassis and outstanding all-round versatility, it’s impossible not to love Yamaha’s top-selling Hyper Naked.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The latest model features 5-inch TFT instruments with switchable screen styles – and smartphone connectivity. And the refined EU5-compliant engine gives you even more linear response with a gutsier exhaust note.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: When it comes to style, the MT-07 is a real head turner. Its distinctive bodywork features twin winglet-type air intakes and compact LED lights giving a bold and futuristic look that shares the same DNA as every Yamaha Hyper Naked. And with its natural ergonomics, accessible seat height and flexible riding position, it’s the ultimate everyday bike!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Being the runaway market leader tells you a lot about the MT-07. It’s been the best-selling Hyper Naked every year since its launch in 2014. But what you may not know is how the idea behind the MT concept came about.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: A decade ago, Yamaha’s design team was tasked with creating a dynamic new kind of bike that owed nothing to its predecessors. The world was already full of good motorcycles. But Yamaha wanted to make a motorcycle without compromising the combination of fun and price, with a unique Japanese character. The kind of machine that you would want to ride at every opportunity.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Taking inspiration from the Japanese subculture, the MT development team focused on producing a series of torque-rich motorcycles with brutal naked styling, agile chassis performance and superb versatility. Hyper Naked had arrived. Now equipped with 5-inch TFT dual-theme instrument giving smartphone connectivity, the latest generation MT-07 offers more than ever.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Featuring a distinctive next generation body with a signature Y-shape LED face and new dual-theme 5-inch TFT instruments with smartphone connectivity, the best-selling MT-07 is the ultimate Hyper Naked middleweight. Offering an unbeatable package with the best balance of torque-rich performance and brutal naked style, this is a bike that works well for everyone!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With over 160.000 units sold, the MT-07 has held the number 1 position in its class since it was launched. With its torque-rich 690cc CP2 engine, compact and agile chassis and outstanding all-round versatility, it’s impossible not to love Yamaha’s top-selling Hyper Naked.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The latest model features 5-inch TFT instruments with switchable screen styles – and smartphone connectivity. And the refined EU5-compliant engine gives you even more linear response with a gutsier exhaust note.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: When it comes to style, the MT-07 is a real head turner. Its distinctive bodywork features twin winglet-type air intakes and compact LED lights giving a bold and futuristic look that shares the same DNA as every Yamaha Hyper Naked. And with its natural ergonomics, accessible seat height and flexible riding position, it’s the ultimate everyday bike!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Being the runaway market leader tells you a lot about the MT-07. It’s been the best-selling Hyper Naked every year since its launch in 2014. But what you may not know is how the idea behind the MT concept came about.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: A decade ago, Yamaha’s design team was tasked with creating a dynamic new kind of bike that owed nothing to its predecessors. The world was already full of good motorcycles. But Yamaha wanted to make a motorcycle without compromising the combination of fun and price, with a unique Japanese character. The kind of machine that you would want to ride at every opportunity.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Taking inspiration from the Japanese subculture, the MT development team focused on producing a series of torque-rich motorcycles with brutal naked styling, agile chassis performance and superb versatility. Hyper Naked had arrived. Now equipped with 5-inch TFT dual-theme instrument giving smartphone connectivity, the latest generation MT-07 offers more than ever.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its high-revving engine, compact chassis and aggressive M1 MotoGP®-inspired fairing, the R3 is Yamaha’s ultimate A2-licence supersport. Featuring dynamic racing colours from Yamaha’s historic GP bikes, the exclusive R3 World GP 60th Anniversary takes R/World to the next level with its iconic race-bred style.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With its high-revving 321cc engine, compact chassis and aggressive M1 MotoGP®-inspired fairing, the R3 is Yamaha’s ultimate A2-licence supersport. And now featuring the dynamic racing colours from Yamaha’s historic GP bikes, the exclusive R3 World GP 60th Anniversary takes R/World to the next level with its iconic race-bred style.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: It was back in 1961 that the company entered its very first international road race at the French Grand Prix. And to mark 60 years of racing success, Yamaha has created the very special R3 World GP 60th Anniversary featuring historic white and red racing colours – to pay tribute to the machines that have racked up more than 500 wins in World Grand Prix racing between 1961 and 2021.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The R3 World GP 60th Anniversary’s white bodywork features the famous red "speed block" graphics that were made famous by Yamaha’s legendary race bikes from previous decades. A red front fender and red stripe on the tank reinforce the GP pedigree – while the historic racing style is completed with golden wheels, a gold tank badge and a yellow race-style number plate.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The exclusive R3 World GP 60th Anniversary embodies 60 years of racing with the historic racing colour scheme that was made famous by the company’s pioneering GP bikes. With its timeless red "speed block" graphics, pure-white fairing, golden wheels and 60th anniversary emblem, the R3 World GP 60th Anniversary pays tribute to a special era in Yamaha’s journey.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Featuring the same race-bred DNA that goes into every R-Series model, the R3 World GP 60th Anniversary is one of the most exciting bikes in the class. The high-revving 321cc engine delivers thrilling power, and its race-bred features include aerodynamic bodywork inspired by the M1 MotoGP® bike, as well as a lightweight chassis, powerful brakes and 37 mm USD front forks for agile and precise handling.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: So if you’ve got an A2 licence and you’re looking for a head-turning, middleweight supersport with premium quality, iconic good looks and outstanding performance – not to mention an exclusive and historic racing colour scheme – the new R3 World GP 60th Anniversary is most definitely your kind of motorcycle.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: R/World is calling. Driven by a high-revving 321cc 2-cylinder EU5 engine and featuring radical YZR-M1 MotoGP® inspired bodywork, high-tech suspension and powerful brakes, the Yamaha R3 is the most advanced 300cc motorcycle on the road or track.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: R-World is calling. Driven by a high-revving 321cc EU5 engine, the R3 comes fully equipped with a wide range of key features that give you outstanding performance, alongside class-leading quality and head-turning style. It’s Yamaha’s ultimate lightweight A2 licence supersport.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The R3’s slim and athletic bodywork features a central air intake that’s inspired by Yamaha’s iconic race-winning M1 MotoGP® machine. Its radical good looks, aerodynamic race-bred fairing and aggressive dual LED headlights underline its pure R-Series DNA, making it the most desirable 300 on the road or track.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: High-specification 37 mm KYB inverted front forks ensure precise suspension feel and feedback – and the combination of a low fuel tank and low handlebars gives the R3 an ergonomic riding position with plenty of comfort together with precise control. You are now ready to enter R/World.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Every model in the Yamaha R-Series is designed and manufactured to give you a thrilling ride every time. The R3 is no exception. Built to the highest standards without compromise, this supersport is always ready for you to enjoy pure riding excitement.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: By taking inspiration from both the M1 MotoGP® bike and the class-leading R1, the lightweight R3 combines a forceful race-bred look with sleek cross-layered bodywork, giving it the presence of a bike twice its size – but you can ride it with an A2 licence.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: But it doesn't just look cool – it’s 321cc 2-cylinder EU5 engine is built to deliver high-revving supersport performance. 37 mm KYB inverted forks work in harmony with the light chassis – while the balanced 50/50 weight distribution ensures superb agility. And with its highly efficient aerodynamics, it's the fastest R3 ever.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The Yamaha YZ65 is designed and built for every young rider who is starting out in motocross. Like all of our winning race bikes, the YZ65 features the latest technology that gives you the performance you need to succeed. Your race career starts here – and Yamaha is with you all the way to the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The YZ65 is the bike that has the speed, handling and durability you need to succeed in one of the world’s toughest sports. It’s a serious youth motocross race bike and is designed for every young racer with a real desire to win.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The YZ65 has been built to the same high standards as Yamaha’s range of adult race bikes. Its potent 65cc liquid-cooled 6-speed engine features Yamaha’s race developed YPVS for race-winning power – and the light semi-double cradle steel frame with aluminium subframe provides stable handling and high agility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Adjustable 36mm upside down front forks and link-less Monocross rear suspension give stable handling over rough terrain, and the adjustable handlebar position enables the YZ65 to grow with you. Equipped with wave discs for powerful braking, a long padded seat and high-grip footrests for comfy riding, as well as dynamic YZ-family graphics and Icon Blue bodywork, the YZ65 is ready to take you to the VictorYZone!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha won its first World MX Championship before today's aspiring young motocross riders were born – and always believed in building strong and durable dirt bikes for everyone, from kids through to seasoned pros. With the YZ65 you get winning performance together with proven Yamaha durability: Welcome to the victorYZone!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Featuring a race-bred specification that’s inspired by the flagship YZ450F, the YZ65 youth motocross bike is the perfect start for every rider who is serious about racing. With a smooth running 2-stroke engine, slick-shifting 6-speed gearbox and a compact, easy handling ergonomic chassis with powerful wave-type disc brakes, this high-tech youth race bike is the ideal introduction to the world of motocross.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Adjustable front suspension makes it easy to set the bike up to suit every rider, and its dynamic YZ-family styling and Icon Blue bodywork and blue rims shows that this little bike has the winning DNA that comes with every Yamaha.

attributes.value: Professional rider with advanced skill depicted on a closed area.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The next phase in your motorcycling journey is about to begin. Developed to give you the ultimate long distance all-weather touring capabilities, NIKEN GT offers a unique perspective on the world around you. You’ve always gone your own way. And now it’s time to discover what lies beyond.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: NIKEN GT is a unique machine that’s been developed for experienced and open-minded riders like you who want to take the next step in their motorcycling journey. From supreme corner carver to ultimate long distance cruiser and all-weather Sport Tourer, this high-specification motorcycle goes beyond your expectations.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The key to NIKEN GT’s outstanding handling performance is Yamaha’s LMW system. Featuring twin leaning front wheels, this innovative front end gives class leading cornering performance with enhanced feelings of stability – and it’s what makes this premium Sport Tourer one of the most capable machines in its category.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: A wide range of significant refinements give you an even more comfortable and exciting ride – including a new adjustable screen and comfort seat as well as revised rear suspension. The larger capacity 890cc CP3 EU5 engine delivers even stronger and smoother torque for effortless acceleration – and a 7-inch TFT meter gives you smartphone connectivity and full-screen Garmin navigation capability.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: At Yamaha we like doing things differently. For nearly 70 years we’ve been developing cutting edge technology and pioneering radical new concepts in our quest to take motorcycling into new territory. NIKEN GT is the perfect example of this. So, if you want to go further it’s time to discover the benefits of this unique riding experience.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: NIKEN GT needs to be ridden to be fully understood. And its innovative LMW technology is going to introduce you to a new feeling of all-weather confidence and riding comfort – whether you’re carving through corners or covering huge distances with a passenger and luggage.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Featuring the latest generation 890cc CP3 high torque EU5 engine with advanced electronics for superior control, NIKEN GT is a truly thrilling performer. A new adjustable screen, reshaped seat and hard side cases give superb long distance comfort and capability – and a connected full colour TFT meter provides information, navigation capability and entertainment.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its punchy engine, Deltabox chassis and MotoGP® – style bodywork, the dynamic R125 supersport is already the hottest property in the 125cc class. Now you can experience genuine race bike style with the stunning R125 World GP 60th Anniversary featuring a historic "speed block" colour scheme to celebrate Yamaha’s 60 years of GP racing.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With its high-tech 125ccc EU5 engine, lightweight chassis and race-bred MotoGP®-style bodywork, the dynamic R125 supersport delivers thrilling performance with precision handling – making it the hottest property in the 125cc class. Featuring the historic white-and-red racing design to celebrate Yamaha’s 60 years of GP racing, the stunning new R125 World GP 60th Anniversary brings iconic race bike style to the 125cc class.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The R125 World GP 60th Anniversary’s aerodynamic white bodywork features Yamaha’s red "speed block" graphics, that were made famous by Yamaha’s Grand Prix race bikes since 1961. And just like the World Championship-winning machinery this exclusive lightweight R-Series comes with gold-coloured wheels, a red front fender and yellow front number plate – as well as a 60th anniversary emblem and bold red stripe running along the top of the fuel tank and tail that signify its pure-racing DNA.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: For outstanding road holding the bike’s compact Deltabox chassis features 41 mm USD front forks and a lightweight aluminium swingarm, as well as state-of-the art brakes and lightweight wheels. The Assist & Slipper (A&S) clutch gives you increased controllability when decelerating – and the stunning looking aerodynamic bodywork with its M1-inspired faring and cockpit make this World GP 60th Anniversary the most desired 125cc supersport and confirm your entry into R/World.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha won the first of many World Championships a few years after the company was founded. So far Yamaha factory bikes have taken over 500 Grand Prix wins – and the R125 World GP 60th Anniversary’s historic white-and-red racing colour scheme pays tribute to 60 years of competing at the very highest level.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Racing is an integral part of Yamaha’s DNA. The company entered and won its first race in Japan just 10 days after the very first Yamaha motorcycle was manufactured in July 1955. But winning at home was just the beginning – and 60 years ago Yamaha made its international road racing debut at the French Grand Prix.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Many of Yamaha’s World Championships were in the 125cc class, and just like the winning race bikes the R125 World GP 60th Anniversary has been built without compromise. From its iconic white-coloured fairing with red "speed block" graphics – as well as the yellow front plate, 60th anniversary emblem and golden wheels – through to the high-tech EU5 engine, lightweight chassis and aggressive MotoGP®-inspired bodywork, the R125 World GP 60th Anniversary is built to lead the way.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: R125 is the best introduction to a new Supersport riding experience without limits. Like every machine in Yamaha’s legendary R-Series family this high-tech lightweight is built without compromise. Featuring a best-in-class specification and equipped with the latest engine, chassis and communication technology, R125 is your connection into R/World.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: R stands for Race. And every motorcycle in the legendary R-Series family can trace its roots straight back to Yamaha’s winning MotoGP® and World Superbike machines. The radical new bodywork on the new R125 is inherited from the R1 and R7, giving this lightweight 125cc Supersport some serious big bike attitude. And equipped with a powerful central LED headlight and dual LED position lights and M-shaped nose, its aggressive new face oozes pure R-Series DNA.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring race-developed Supersport geometry, the Deltabox chassis is equipped with state-of-the-art 41mm KYB upside-down front forks and link-type rear suspension for super-agile handling. The footrest/seat/handlebar layout gives a sporty riding position for optimum control – and the new 5-inch TFT instruments with smartphone connectivity via Bluetooth® keep you informed, and in touch.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: For strong performance at all speeds the 125cc EURO5 4-stroke engine is equipped with Yamaha’s power-boosting Variable Valve Actuation (VVA) technology – and the traction control system and assist & slipper clutch enhance controllability when you’re accelerating and decelerating. With a premium finish available in a choice of Icon Blue and Tech Black, R125 has everything you need to connect into R/World.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The Yamaha R125 is a no-compromise motorcycle that’s built for young riders like you who want to discover the ultimate lightweight Supersport experience. And just like every high-tech performance machine in the legendary R-Series family, this A1-license model is ready to introduce you to an exciting new riding experience without limits.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Featuring an aerodynamic new body design that’s been inspired by Yamaha’s winning MotoGP® and World Superbike factory machines, the R125 is the most advanced 125cc motorcycle ever produced by Yamaha. Equipped with a powerful central LED headlight and dual LED position lights, its aggressive new face oozes pure R-Series DNA.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The new 5-inch TFT colour instruments feature ‘Street’ and ‘Track’ themes for road and circuit riding – and its smartphone connectivity via Bluetooth® enables you to keep in touch. Look under the skin and you’ll see that this radical bike is packed with advanced R-Series technology and torque-rich 125cc EURO 5 4-stroke VVA engine, that delivers remarkable performance for an unforgettable riding experience. R125 has everything you need to connect into R/World.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Yamaha's MT models are amongst Europe's top-selling bikes. There’s the MT-03 with serious street presence and iconic looks inspired by the larger MTs featuring a predatory twin-eye face along with upside-down forks, LCD instruments and a sophisticated 2-cylinder engine.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Yamaha's Hyper Naked bikes are built to thrill. With their muscular styling and adrenaline charged performance, the top-selling MT models have stolen the hearts and minds of riders all over Europe. And there’s the MT-03 that comes with a high specification and serious street presence.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Inspired by Yamaha’s larger Hyper Nakeds, the aggressive look is more MT than ever. Its predatory twin-eye face projects the moodiest stare, and upside-down forks and a wide-shouldered fuel tank underline the dynamic MT family look to make this the ultimate 300!

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: But what really makes this lightweight Hyper Naked so attractive and desirable is the fact that it's built with pure MT DNA which means that every ride is a thrilling and addictive experience. You'll want to get out and ride whenever you can. Because this bike just loves to be ridden.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: With their naked bodywork, agile handling and exciting torque-rich performance, Yamaha's Hyper Naked models give you aggressive looks with a thrilling ride. Featuring forceful styling with performance focused technology, the MT-03 combines big bike status with lightweight versatility.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The radical face features dual slant-eye position lights and a compact LED headlight that make this one of the coolest looking bikes in its category – and with its mass-forward bodywork and fighter-jet style air scoops, this high-tech 300 is ready to punch above its weight.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: A wide tank cover and optimal ergonomics enable you to fit snugly into the bike for a superbly comfortable ride – and to reinforce the big bike look and feel, the MT-03 is equipped with 37 mm upside-down forks for outstanding handling performance. Never before has a 300 offered you so much.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The new generation WR450F has been completely redesigned from the ground up. Its lighter, stronger and faster engine as well as the compact and agile aluminium chassis are developed straight from the MXGP race winning motocross bike. And the renewed Power Tuner app gives you ultimate control.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The all-new WR450F gives you a whole new level of controllability for ultimate performance on all types of fast, slippery and technical terrain. Equipped with Yamaha’s potent next generation 450cc engine and running with a compact new aluminium chassis – both developed directly from the latest MXGP race-winning YZ450F – the all-new WR450F puts you in charge.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Producing higher levels of strong and linear power, the newly developed 450cc reverse-head engine is lighter and faster than ever. The enduro-specific ECU and 5-speed wide ratio transmission deliver increased performance and traction over a wide speed range – and the renewed Power Tuner app makes it easier to select the right mapping for total control in widely varying track and weather conditions.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Equipped with an all-new aluminium chassis, the WR450F feels more compact and agile than ever. Super-slim seamless bodywork and a flatter seat make weight shifting quicker and easier for the highest level of manoeuverability – and the best-in-class KYB suspension is lowered by 10mm and runs revised settings for increased low speed cornering performance.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: For 2024 the new WR450F benefits from the very latest engine and chassis technology from the race winning YZ450F. The combination of a stronger engine and redesigned lightweight chassis with compact bodywork make this the best-ever 450cc Yamaha enduro bike with the highest degree of controllability in a wide range of situations.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Its new lightweight aluminium chassis gives a lower center of gravity that ensures more agile handling and faster cornering – giving you the advantage in all conditions. The revised rider triangle means that you can shift your body position more easily to maintain peak control – and the best-in-class KYB suspension comes with different settings for better terrain following and increased traction.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The WR450F’s Power Tuner app is one of the most important developments in the field of rider control electronics. And Yamaha’s designers have developed a renewed Power Tuner system for the new model – making it easier and quicker for you to adjust engine power character to match the terrain, weather and riding style.

attributes.name: productDisclaimer
attributes.value: The 2024 WR450F and WR250F will be only be available in race specification, for usage on closed circuits, private areas and specific events where participation with non-registered vehicles is allowed. Always wear a helmet, eye protection and protective clothing. Yamaha encourages you to ride safely and respect fellow riders and the environment. Images displayed may depict a professional rider performing under controlled conditions or on closed circuit. The unit displayed on the images may be equipped with genuine Yamaha accessories and/or non-Yamaha branded accessories which may be for closed-circuit use only. All information is given for general guidance. Specifications and appearance of Yamaha products, Yamaha accessories and non-Yamaha branded accessories are subject to change without prior notice. Non Yamaha branded accessories are fully developed and produced by respected third parties. Yamaha does not guarantee the availability of the displayed products and accessories in local markets. The product and accessories range may be limited in some countries. Yamaha has the right to discontinue products and accessories without prior notice. Where applicable, prices of Yamaha products and accessories may vary according to local requirements and conditions. No rights can be obtained from this information. For further details and availability, please contact your local Yamaha dealer.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: This legendary off-road bike is built to give you high levels of useable power with precise control, making it one of the most capable enduro models in its class. Developed from the Grand Prix winning YZ models and featuring a wide range of enduro-specific settings, the WR450F is Yamaha’s most exciting, versatile and user-friendly large capacity enduro bike.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: When you need a high-performance enduro bike with a rider-friendly engine character combined with agile handling and easily adjustable performance, the WR450F is the way to go. Able to handle the most severe terrain and built to go as far as you want, this high-tech large-capacity dirt bike is born to ride.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Yamaha’s engineers have taken the compact and lightweight engine from the 2022 YZ450F and developed an enduro-specific powerplant for the latest WR450F. Its ‘made-to-measure’ ECU as well as a high-compression cylinder head and a specially designed heavy-duty transmission are ready to deliver winning performance. And the best-in-class suspension and the lightweight aluminium beam frame with a finely-tuned rigidity balance give you easy manoeuvrability and accurate surface feedback.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Yamaha’s digital Power Tuner and handlebar-mounted engine mode switch put you in total control when track conditions change – and the compact multi-function display gives you all the information you need to keep ahead. Finished in a dynamic Icon Blue with in-mould graphics, the mighty WR450F is ready for any battle.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The enduro world is evolving. And to make it to the podium you need a special kind of dirt bike that combines the hard-hitting performance of a motocross machine with all-day useability and precise control. Developed from the high-tech 2022 YZ450F, the latest WR450F is built to deliver, and ready to win.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Fire up the mass-centralized 450cc engine and you’ll experience remarkable levels of power and torque from the second you get moving – while the aluminium chassis and class-leading suspension give you lightweight agility with confident stability and easy cornering.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: With its enduro-specific rigidity balance, the aluminium beam frame is finely tuned to give a high level of feedback and strong traction on various types of terrain – while the best-in-class suspension means that you can maximize the winning potential of the powerful engine. Yamaha WR450F: Go fast. Turn easy. Stop quick.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its outstanding versatility, class-leading technology and remarkable performance, the new TRACER 9 GT+ is the definitive Sport Tourer that has the power to expand your possibilities. When you’re far from home, headed to your dream destination, you want to be able to have absolute confidence in your touring partner.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The new TRACER 9 GT+ is Yamaha’s ultimate Sport Tourer with a best-in-class specification that delivers new levels of versatility, functionality and controllability. It’s a motorcycle with the genuine potential to enrich your life by giving you the freedom to journey to faraway places whenever the mood takes you.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Equipped with the most advanced electronics support package ever seen on a Yamaha, the new TRACER 9 GT+ is built to take your riding experience to the next level. Its Adaptive Cruise Control and radar-linked Unified Brake System make every journey smoother and more relaxing – and the integrated riding modes make choosing the right set up so much easier.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The 7-inch multi-theme TFT meter offers full smartphone connectivity, enabling you to stay in touch when you’re on the move – and enabled for the Garmin Motorise app** you can access full-map navigation for effective route planning. All this cutting edge technology adds up to a very special Sport Tourer that is ready to take you wherever you want to go.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Powered by Yamaha’s famous 890cc CP3 engine, the TRACER 9 GT+ produces outstanding performance at all engine speeds. Its strong, linear torque along with the upgraded bi-directional quickshifter deliver stunning seamless acceleration – and the new integrated ride modes make it simple to set up for different conditions.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Whether you’re pushing hard on a twisty mountain road or highway cruising with a passenger and luggage, the lightweight aluminium Deltabox frame and KYB semi-active suspension balances stability with agility. With its full LED lighting and cornering lights, the TRACER 9 GT+ gives you added night-time riding confidence.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: As well as its sophisticated electronics the TRACER 9 GT+ comes with a range of well thought out details that you’ll appreciate on every ride. Hard side cases are mounted to stays with built in dampers to eliminate vibes – and a grip heater provides all-season warmth. Offered in dedicated colours and graphics, TRACER 9 GT+ is always ready to go.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Developed from Yamaha’s Grand Prix winning motocross bike, the WR250F enduro takes 250cc 4-stroke performance to another level. Equipped with a high-tech reverse-head engine as well as a compact aluminium chassis with best-in-class suspension – and featuring Yamaha’s latest generation Power Tuner – the WR250F is ready to win.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: This is the kind of enduro bike that is ready to give you winning performance in a wide range of riding conditions. Developed from Yamaha’s Grand Prix winning motocross bike, the WR250F delivers stunning acceleration and speed – and with its enduro-specific features and class-leading suspension this machine is built to conquer the most technical terrain – from high-speed tracks through to technical woods riding.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The YZ250F-type cylinder head features a wide intake port and high-performance exhaust camshaft that give rapid mid to top-end performance while retaining the WR250F’s strong low rpm torque. And the lightweight aluminium beam frame developed from Yamaha’s motocross bike has been enduro-tuned to give the right balance of rigidity for precise feel and accurate surface feedback over tough terrain.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: A light and powerful front braking system gives you ultimate controllability – and enduro features include a multi-function meter and a specially-developed exhaust and muffler design. The light-feeling clutch and 6-speed wide-ratio transmission are ready for the most extreme challenge – and with the Power Tuner smartphone app and a 2-mode engine map switch, the intelligent WR250F can be set up to handle virtually any riding or weather conditions.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The WR250F is built to shake up the world of enduro and change the way that you look at the 250cc 4-stroke class. Featuring advanced motocross technology from Yamaha’s Grand Prix-winning YZ250F – and equipped with a range of enduro-specific features – it’s one of the most exciting bikes of the decade.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Equipped with the powerful YZ250F engine that benefits from a wide inlet tract as well as higher-performance exhaust camshaft and ECU, this is the quickest ever WR250F. And with its motocross-style aluminium chassis that’s been specially tuned for the unique requirements of enduro – as well as a large-diameter 270mm front disc brake – this bike is in another league.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: As well as looking ‘full-factory’ in its Icon Blue finish, it’s also pretty smart. Onboard Wi-Fi means you can fine-tune the engine power using your smartphone – while the compact multi-meter tells you what you need to know. And with a high level of motocross performance combined with its legendary enduro stamina, the WR250F is the ultimate off-road package.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Sport Touring never felt this good. Equipped with sophisticated semi-active suspension, hard side cases, grip heaters, up & down QSS and LED cornering lights, the TRACER 9 GT gives you dynamic touring comfort – while its high-torque 890cc CP3 engine and lightweight aluminium chassis ensure ultimate sports versatility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Sport Touring never felt this good. With a sophisticated specification that includes electronic semi-active suspension that constantly adjusts front and rear damping force to give you the smoothest and most secure ride – whatever the load or speed – the TRACER 9 GT is engineered to deliver the highest levels of dynamic touring comfort.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Aerodynamic hard side cases can carry a full-face helmet and feature colour coordinated panels as standard. You can also fit an optional top case if you need extra space – and the fully-floating luggage carrier system gives a natural riding feeling even when fully loaded.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: For confident night-time riding the TRACER 9 GT is fitted with LED cornering lights that get brighter as you lean further – while 10-stage adjustable grip heaters keep your hands warm whatever the weather. And for ultimate sports versatility this high-tech performance bike comes with up & down QSS for smoother and faster gear shifting.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The Sport Touring world changed forever when Yamaha launched the first TRACER. Its combination of thrilling torque-rich performance and remarkable long-distance comfort completely revolutionised the category. And since then, over 50,000 riders have chosen the TRACER and made it the best-selling model in the class.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Developed for experienced riders who want the latest cutting-edge technology that will deliver the very highest levels of dynamic touring comfort, the TRACER 9 GT is one of the most exciting and versatile Sport Tourers made by Yamaha. Its 890cc CP3 engine does everything you ask of it – and its agile handling chassis and next-generation bodywork are ready for anything.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The TRACER 9 GT’s specification includes electronically-controlled suspension, LED cornering lights and grip heaters – as well as hard side cases, Quick Shifter System and dedicated colours. It all adds up to ultimate sport versatility, giving you and your partner the ability to go as far as you desire in total comfort.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Sport Touring never felt this good. Equipped with sophisticated semi-active suspension, hard side cases, grip heaters, up & down QSS and LED cornering lights, the TRACER 9 GT gives you dynamic touring comfort – while its high-torque 890cc CP3 engine and lightweight aluminium chassis ensure ultimate sports versatility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Sport Touring never felt this good. With a sophisticated specification that includes electronic semi-active suspension that constantly adjusts front and rear damping force to give you the smoothest and most secure ride – whatever the load or speed – the TRACER 9 GT is engineered to deliver the highest levels of dynamic touring comfort.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Aerodynamic hard side cases can carry a full-face helmet and feature colour coordinated panels as standard. You can also fit an optional top case if you need extra space – and the fully-floating luggage carrier system gives a natural riding feeling even when fully loaded.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: For confident night-time riding the TRACER 9 GT is fitted with LED cornering lights that get brighter as you lean further – while 10-stage adjustable grip heaters keep your hands warm whatever the weather. And for ultimate sports versatility this high-tech performance bike comes with up & down QSS for smoother and faster gear shifting.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The Sport Touring world changed forever when Yamaha launched the first TRACER. Its combination of thrilling torque-rich performance and remarkable long-distance comfort completely revolutionised the category. And since then, over 50,000 riders have chosen the TRACER and made it the best-selling model in the class.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Developed for experienced riders who want the latest cutting-edge technology that will deliver the very highest levels of dynamic touring comfort, the TRACER 9 GT is one of the most exciting and versatile Sport Tourers made by Yamaha. Its 890cc CP3 engine does everything you ask of it – and its agile handling chassis and next-generation bodywork are ready for anything.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The TRACER 9 GT’s specification includes electronically-controlled suspension, LED cornering lights and grip heaters – as well as hard side cases, Quick Shifter System and dedicated colours. It all adds up to ultimate sport versatility, giving you and your partner the ability to go as far as you desire in total comfort.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Get ready for a radical change to the way you see the world. Because this dynamic Hyper Naked is ready to power you into the thrilling new dimension of the Dark Side of Japan where unconventional attitude is key and where the bikes are Masters of Torque. Discover the Dark rider inside of you with the MT-125.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With their dynamic style, naked bodywork and thrilling performance, it’s no surprise that Yamaha’s MT models have lured so many riders into the Dark Side of Japan. The breed is constantly evolving. The radical MT-125 is ready to bring even more performance, attitude and adrenaline to the 125 class.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Featuring a high-tech EU5 compliant engine as well as compact mass-forward bodywork and aggressive next-generation MT design, this exciting 125 is like no other. So get ready to discover the Dark rider inside of you. Because this lightweight Hyper Naked is going to transform your world.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Built with pure MT DNA, this sporty lightweight is the ultimate introduction to the Hyper Naked motorcycling experience. So find out what it’s like to ride a true Master of Torque and discover your Dark Side.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Even when it’s standing still the aggressively-styled MT-125 has got some serious attitude. Bold twin-eye position lights give this lightweight Hyper Naked the most intimidating face in the category. The muscular mass-forward bodywork looks ready to attack at any minute.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: As soon as you get moving you’re going to be totally blown away by its performance. The high-tech 125cc 4-stroke EU5 engine features Yamaha’s exclusive torque-boosting VVA system that produces impressive response at low rpm for thrilling acceleration and exciting top-end performance as well.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Equipped with a Deltabox frame as well as a wide 140-section rear tyre, 41mm upside down forks, an A&S clutch, modern 5’’ TFT meter with mobile connectivity and full LED lighting, the MT-125 combines sophisticated technology with radical naked style like nothing else.

attributes.name: productOverviewHeader
attributes.value: Fun for one, fun for all.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: The TT-R125 has everything you need to have endless good times with friends and family. Its simple and reliable 125cc 4-stroke engine produces smooth and controllable power – and with long-travel suspension, off road tyres and rugged motocross-style bodywork, this bike is always ready for some fun in the dirt!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Built for youth and adult riders, the TT-R125 is a tough dirt bike that likes to enjoy itself! Rugged, reliable and simple to maintain, this user-friendly off roader is designed for maximum fun with family and friends!

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: At the heart of this durable off roader there’s a compact air-cooled 125cc 4-stroke engine delivering plenty of smooth and controllable power. An electric start makes it easy to get moving, and the 5-speed gearbox allows you to get maximum enjoyment from the TT-R125 – wherever you may go.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The impressive specification includes long-travel front and rear suspension for smooth and confident handling – as well as a 220mm front disc brake, impact-resistant polypropylene bodywork and a 19-inch front wheel and 16-inch rear wheel with knobbly tyres. Let the fun begin!

attributes.name: productShortStoryHeader
attributes.value: Fun for one, fun for all.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Yamaha’s kids’ bikes have been introducing children and their families to the fun and excitement of motorcycling for many years. Each bike in the range is designed to be easy to use and simple to maintain, and with a range of different sized bikes available there’s a model to suit virtually every age from 4 years and upwards.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Designed for older kids who may be graduating from the mid-sized TT-R110 – as well as for adults who want a light and easy-to-maintain fun bike – the TT-R125 is the most powerful in the TT-R line. With its smooth shifting 5-speed transmission and manual clutch, it’s an ideal way to develop valuable machine handling skills for the future.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: You also get many of the high-spec features associated with Yamaha’s bigger motocross bikes, including a disc front brake, electric start and lightweight bodywork. So the TT-R125 can take on tough terrain and – like all TTR-models – Yamaha quality and reliability come as standard.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Sporty, versatile and functional, the TRACER 9 will take you and your partner to the new places you’ve always been dreaming about. Its high-torque 890cc engine has the power to go fast and far – and with its relaxed ergonomics, agile handling and 350 km+ range, this dynamic Sport Tourer gives you instant access to another world.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Whether your dream destination is near or far, TRACER 9 is the most inspiring and exciting way to travel. Touring is so much more than just riding – and with its easy ergonomics, aerodynamic bodywork and generous luggage capacity, this motorcycle is designed to make sure that you and your partner can enjoy every minute of every journey.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Its economical 890cc high-torque CP3 engine has the flexibility to cruise at whatever speed feels best – and with the ability to ride over 350 km between refills you can cover huge distances in a single day. And when you feel in the mood to push harder the TRACER 9 has the power and agility to get your adrenaline flowing on Europe’s legendary mountain roads.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Wherever you travel you can always depend on the TRACER 9’s smart technology to make every ride more exhilarating. Its 6-axis IMU governs the lean-sensitive electronic rider aids that give you control and confidence in varying surface and weather conditions – while twin TFT meters and full LED lighting underline this versatile Sport Tourer’s premium specification.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: In 2015, the first Tracer 900 changed the Sport Touring class forever. With its torque-rich CP3 engine, sporty chassis and all-round versatility, it became the bike of choice for over 50,000 European riders who wanted an agile and exciting multi-role motorcycle with plenty of attitude. Perhaps no surprise then that it’s the best-selling bike of its class.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Equipped with powerful 890cc CP3 engine as well as an agile and responsive aluminium Deltabox chassis – and featuring the most sophisticated electronic rider aids from Yamaha’s dominant R1 Supersport bike – the TRACER 9 is ready to turn up your emotions.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Sporty, light and easy to live with, the TRACER 9 is the kind of bike that is always ready to do what you want and take wherever you desire. With is high overall specification as well as athletic wind-beating bodywork, 3-bag luggage capacity and strong all-round performance, this high-specification Sport Tourer is ready to take on the world.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Compact, great looking, easy to ride and simple to own, the TT-R110 is Yamaha’s mid-sized fun bike for young and not-so-young riders – including first timers. Equipped with a quiet-running electric start engine, low seat height and automatic clutch, this friendly off roader is the ideal choice for kids of all ages who just want to have fun in the dirt!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The Yamaha TT-R110 is a favourite choice with so many riders – whether you’re stepping up from a smaller PW50 or TT-R50 or buying your first off roader. Everything about this mid-sized youth bike is aimed at providing you and your family and friends with endless outdoors fun and many lifelong memories.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: For easy steering and high levels of rider comfort this great-looking motorcycle features a low seat height with long-travel front forks and monocross rear suspension – while the 14-inch front wheel and 12-inch rear wheel are fitted with durable knobbly tyres to handle off road terrain. And the tough Icon Blue bodywork is inspired by Yamaha’s winning race bikes.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: New and experienced off-road riders will love the smooth and strong performance of the quiet-running electric start 110cc 4-stroke engine – and with its automatic clutch, the 4-speed gearbox is very easy to use. Key-type ignition gives added security, and low maintenance features make the TT-R110 so much fun to ride – and easy to own.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: Whichever Yamaha you choose, you can be sure that it has been built to the same high quality and safety standards as all of the company’s 2-wheel products. And like every model in the kids’ bike line, the TT-R110 is designed to be simple to use, fun to ride and easy to maintain.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: The real beauty of the TT-R110 is that it’s an extremely versatile and easy to ride off road motorcycle – suitable for younger and older kids. Its rugged steel backbone frame is equipped with long travel suspension that soaks up the bumps for a comfortable and relaxing ride.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Smooth, quiet and economical, the 110cc 4-stroke engine delivers plenty of easy-to-control power, making this an ideal off road fun bike for the whole family. Simply select first gear, twist the throttle and you’re away! It really is that easy. Small package – big fun!

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: When you introduce your kids to the Yamaha TT-R50 you’ll be opening up a whole new world of outdoors family fun. Suitable for new riders between 4 and 7 years of age, this user-friendly mini motorcycle is ready to make dreams come true!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: Fun, safe and easy to ride, Yamaha mini motorcycles have been making kids’ dreams come true for over 40 years. The TT-R50 is the smallest model in our 4-stroke youth bike range, making it ideal for riders between 4 and 7 years of age with no or limited riding experience. And because it’s a Yamaha, you can be confident that quality and reliability come as standard.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The quiet-running and reliable 50cc 4-stroke engine is started by the push of a button, and there’s a 3-speed transmission and automatic clutch for added simplicity. The low seat gives smaller riders added confidence, and the TT-R50’s low weight and compact dimensions make it easy to handle and simple to transport.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The good-looking Icon Blue bodywork is inspired by Yamaha’s famous GP-winning motocross bikes, and with its comfortable ergonomics, long-travel suspension and knobbly tyres, the TT-R50 is ready to provide many hours of family fun for many years to come.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The TT-R50 is the smallest and lightest bike in Yamaha’s 4-stroke fun bike line up, and you can rest assured that is has been manufactured to the same high standards as our larger capacity motorcycles.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Take a closer look at the rugged TT-R50 and you can see that a lot of careful thought has gone into its design. Its low seat height gives a confident and relaxed riding position that’s ideal for beginners, and the simple electric start makes it easy to get moving.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: The 50cc 4-stroke engine is smooth, quiet and economical – and the 3-speed transmission with an automatic clutch is so easy to use. With Yamaha’s renowned quality and reliability, the rider-friendly TT-R50 is ready to give many years of family fun.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its thrilling engine performance, agile handling and fully equipped specification, the versatile TRACER 7 GT is the perfect motorcycle for long distance touring as well as weekday commuting and day trips out of the city. Featuring a 5-inch full colour TFT meter with smartphone notifications, this dynamic middleweight gives you more.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The TRACER 7 GT is a true Sport Tourer that offers you a dynamic riding experience on every journey – from long distance touring through to urban commuting and day trips into the countryside. The 5-inch full-colour TFT meter gives you smartphone connectivity via the MyRide app. Standard equipment includes 20-litre hard side cases as well as a high screen and luxury seat for all-day comfort with year-round versatility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Driven by Yamaha’s outstanding torque-rich 690cc CP2 EU5 engine and featuring a compact and lightweight chassis with a wind-beating fairing, the TRACER 7 GT is the ultimate middleweight for riders who want sport bike excitement combined with long-range versatility and urban flexibility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Dual LED headlights and modern bodywork give the TRACER 7 GT a dynamic and sporty look that sets it apart from other bikes in the category. And there’s a wide range of Genuine Yamaha Accessories that give you the opportunity to customise your bike to suit your own specific requirements.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: As soon as you see the TRACER 7 GT it’s clear that this is a bike that means business. Everything about this dynamic and versatile motorcycle is designed to give you a ride like no other. And once you’re on the move you’ll know that this modern Sport Tourer has the ability to make every ride as exciting and memorable as the first time you took to two wheels.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: What really makes this bike so special is its ability to perform like a sports bike while at the same time offering the genuine long-distance capability of a tourer. And whether you go near or far – in the city and on the open road – this machine is built to get your adrenaline pumping and put a big smile on your face seven days a week!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: There’s nothing else quite like the TRACER 7 GT’s EU5 690cc CP2 engine. Once you feel the wave of linear torque and experience the thrilling acceleration you’ll never look back. The compact chassis gives easy agility with high-speed stability. And with its full touring specification, long-range capability and connected full colour TFT meter, this is a bike that’s ready for anything.

And once you’re on the move you’ll know that this modern Sport Tourer has the ability to make every ride as exciting and memorable as the first time you took to two wheels.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: What really makes this bike so special is its ability to perform like a sports bike while at the same time offering the genuine long-distance capability of a tourer. And whether you go near or far – in the city and on the open road – this machine is built to get your adrenaline pumping and put a big smile on your face seven days a week!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: There’s nothing else quite like the TRACER 7 GT’s EU5 690cc CP2 engine. Once you feel the wave of linear torque and experience the thrilling acceleration you’ll never look back. The compact chassis gives easy agility with high-speed stability. And with its full touring specification, long-range capability and connected full colour TFT meter, this is a bike that’s ready for anything.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: With its thrilling engine performance, agile handling and fully equipped specification, the versatile TRACER 7 GT is the perfect motorcycle for long distance touring as well as weekday commuting and day trips out of the city. Featuring a 5-inch full colour TFT meter with smartphone notifications, this dynamic middleweight gives you more.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: The TRACER 7 GT is a true Sport Tourer that offers you a dynamic riding experience on every journey – from long distance touring through to urban commuting and day trips into the countryside. The 5-inch full-colour TFT meter gives you smartphone connectivity via the MyRide app. Standard equipment includes 20-litre hard side cases as well as a high screen and luxury seat for all-day comfort with year-round versatility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Driven by Yamaha’s outstanding torque-rich 690cc CP2 EU5 engine and featuring a compact and lightweight chassis with a wind-beating fairing, the TRACER 7 GT is the ultimate middleweight for riders who want sport bike excitement combined with long-range versatility and urban flexibility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: Dual LED headlights and modern bodywork give the TRACER 7 GT a dynamic and sporty look that sets it apart from other bikes in the category. And there’s a wide range of Genuine Yamaha Accessories that give you the opportunity to customise your bike to suit your own specific requirements.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: When you need to clear your head and escape into another world, the dynamic TRACER 7 is always ready. Just open the throttle, hold on tight, and focus on powering through the next bend. And suddenly you’re in a much better place.

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: With a thrilling character and a whole lot of attitude, the TRACER 7 is equipped to get your adrenaline pumping whenever you ride. After work or at the weekend, this dynamic Sport Tourer is ready to thrill you with its outstanding performance and lightweight agility.

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: The 690cc EU5 engine produces a wave of linear torque that just keeps on coming right through the rev range for remarkable acceleration in every gear – and the compact chassis and adjustable suspension slice quickly and precisely through every corner.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The aerodynamic bodywork with dual LED headlights reinforces the bike’s modern design and forceful good looks – while a full-colour TFT meter gives you notifications from your smart phone. And with its long-distance ergonomics, wide handlebars and adjustable screen, this versatile middleweight is always ready for your next road trip. TRACER 7: It’s Your Turn.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: The TRACER 7 has been designed and engineered to offer you thrilling performance with high levels of comfort and dynamic style in just about every situation. And the latest full-colour TFT instruments improve the total riding experience with a modern design and smartphone notifications.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Sporty bodywork with powerful dual LED projector headlights give the TRACER 7 a bold and dynamic look – and the adjustable screen and specially designed one-piece dual seat enhance rider and passenger comfort on long distance rides.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: Featuring Yamaha’s industry-leading crossplane technology, the highly-acclaimed 690cc CP2 EU5 engine produces plenty of strong, linear torque for a truly invigorating riding experience. With its adjustable suspension and easy-going ergonomics, this high-specification Sport Tourer is ready for more thrills, more comfort and more fun.

attributes.name: productShortIntro
attributes.value: Designed for the youngest new riders, the iconic PW50 is the most successful kids’ fun bike of all time. Equipped with many user-friendly features including fully automatic transmission, a simple 2-stroke engine, handlebar-mounted brake levers and shaft drive, the PW50 is ready to start making memories now!

attributes.name: productLongIntroA
attributes.value: During the past 40 years the iconic PW50 has introduced hundreds of thousands of kids – and their parents – to the fun and excitement of motorcycling. Designed with a strong focus on fun, simplicity and safety, this lightweight mini motorcycle is guaranteed to provide enjoyment for all the family – and make some treasured memories along the way!

attributes.name: productLongIntroB
attributes.value: Everything about the legendary PW50 is designed to make riding safe, easy and enjoyable. There’s a throttle limiter that lets you adjust the top speed, and the compact chassis with plush suspension and low seat height ensure a comfortable ride with lightweight handling.

attributes.name: productLongIntroC
attributes.value: The zippy, fully-automatic 50cc engine delivers smooth acceleration – and the shaft drive and separate 2-stroke oil tank make maintenance simple. Designed to fit into the back of a car or small van, the lightweight PW50 is easy to transport – and with its Yamaha build quality this premium kids’ bike will give years of family fun!

attributes.name: productStoryBodyA
attributes.value: They’re young only once, so you naturally want the very best for your child. And when you take a closer look at the Yamaha PW50 you’ll see that this high quality mini motorcycle comes with plenty of user-friendly features and uncomplicated technology that make it the favourite choice of many parents all around the world.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyB
attributes.value: Simplicity is the key, and everything about the PW50 is designed to make it fun to ride and easy to own. The 2-stroke 50cc engine features fully-automatic transmission for ‘twist-and-go’ performance, and the handlebar-mounted brake levers – as well as a shaft drive and a low seat – make it the ideal first bike for every child.

attributes.name: productStoryBodyC
attributes.value: With many kids spending a lot of time playing inside on electronic devices, the Yamaha PW50 is the ideal way to encourage them to get involved in a physical outdoor activity and to build skills and confidence! Brothers and sisters can all share the PW50 through the years and start creating some great memories for you and your family.
